Oculus Quest 2 is amazing!  Buy it!!  Graphics are awesome and the headset is ok but I do suggest purchasing the Elite headstrap for better comfort.  The speakers make gameplay very immersive.  The game library is somewhat limited now but new games are being released on a regular basis.

Wow I love this VR headset!  I had tried the go and have the PSVR and I was blown away with not realizing you can set boundaries with this and that it’ll show you a black and white image of the area around you so you can actually move around and find things without taking it on and off.

Took a short time to assemble and connect.  Worked well after looking up on line manual.  Takes a little while to get used to movement in VR world-the motion and little vertigo. Having a place to briefly sit to play helped. Problems resolved quickly and the system was greatly enjoyed.

Oculus 2 packaged up nicely. Recommend spending the extra dollars for higher memory which I did. If your planning on connecting to your pc you'll need to buy the cable and adapter. Overall Satisfied with the VR experience. Best Buy staff are helpful if you need anything just ask them.

This maybe awesome but for someone that has never had Facebook and dose not plan on getting it i think it is a shame that you need to have social media account in order to get past the set up of this. Returns this item halfway through the set up due to needing Facebook what a bummer.

Always wanted a vr and hear the quest 2 is a great one to buy. I bought it and I don't regret it, works great. Not hard to set up at all, visual is great, sound is great, and the mic works great. Just wish the quest 2 had individual finger sensors but for the price you can't beat it.

Ive had the Oculus quest 2 for a little over a week and its very good, it's intuitive and quick and the tracking is surprisingly good but if you move too fast it will loose traking, but besides that its real good. Oh and when its does lose traking it figures is out in a quick second.

Seriously. Where have you been all my life. 
I haven't been a game player in a very long time. 
But I can't stop with this thing. Bought the husband one for 
Christmas, now we both have one and its a great escape
since we aren't TV watchers.
The freedom and immersiveness  is insane.

Super quick shipping. Bought one for our daughter for Christmas and after watching a few videos I knew I had to get one for myself. So far two other close friends have purchased one after trying mine out. Work up a sweat and have a blast at the same time. Visuals still blow my mind.

Lenses are terrible and make everything look like it's got a halo around it or weird streaks. Pc gaming with oculus link cable looks horrible with compression artifacts everywhere. Rift s is still far superior for pc gaming, it's a real shame they tried to replace it with this junk.

Had used a PSVR in the past but wasn’t crazy about the wires. Tried an Oculus Quest 2 and loved being wired free! Immediately bought one and within less than a week purchased another one for my girlfriend so that we can play together! It’s so easy to use and I highly recommend it!!

Well, I hesitated giving this product a 4/5 stars, considering the battery life is not ideal. Consequently, I do suggest the battery pack designed for the Oculus - Quest 2. Otherwise, this is a perfect solution for bringing the 'virtual world' into your reality. I highly recommend.

I’ve played with this every day since I purchased it.  So real and worth what I paid for.  Enjoying every minute of playing.  Although the battery life is quicker than I expected, I’m glad because it gives me a break from playing.  Recommend for gamers who want something different.

To anyone wondering if they should get the 64GB over the 256GB, get the 256GB! You'll quickly find that there are a ton of fun games and you'll be left with little space soon enough, and that amount of extra space for $100 difference on such a great VR device is definitely worth it

I had the first quest , then got this one and I like the cheaper price and the option to add a better strap etc. Its a great device for anyone over 13 and intuitive . I found it pretty easy to learn how to use it. After 30 days of daily use I would definitely recommend this setup !

Purchased this as a gift for my son and he loves it.  I also got a chance to try it out recently and it was awesome.  I went with the 256 gb because I wasn't sure how much the 64 gb was going to hold.  And since you can't expand the memory, I thought it was worth the extra $100.00.

This is an amazing VR.  My son and his friends play this daily.  He talked me into trying it and i could not believe how fun it was and the tutorial teaches how to to use it.  It takes a little time to adjust but once you do its a fun time.  The built in micorphone has great sound!

This is my third Oculus and it has never taken me less than three trips to Best Buy to have everything I need to make it work. I bought a $2000 gaming computer, got it home, and figured out that since it doesn’t have a USB c connector that my Oculus is basically dead in the water.

Works great and my daughter loved it. It’s awesome independently from the computer. And Although computer savvy, took me a little while to connected to her PC. Couldn’t get the USB-C link cable in time for her birthday, so I got one aftermarket from Amazon and it seems to work OK.

The picture quality it amazing, totally makes you feel like you are in a different universe! The sound is great. Was able to connect Bluetooth headphones as well, which is a huge plus since when I originally Purchased I was under the impression they couldn’t. Battery life is good.

The Occulus Quest 2 is a great, mobile, user friendly VR headset that has quite a few fun games to choose from. Beat Saber is tons of fun to play with your friends and family. We started out with one headset, and that quickly turned into 5 headsets so that we could all play together. There is a fun MMO game too called Zenith that I've been enjoying as well. 

The biggest downsides are that:

1. a facebook account is required. I suggest making a dummy account so that they can't leach all your personal information to sell. 

2. In game purchases due add up if you want to get the full experience on some of the games (I'm looking at you beat saber) 

One thing to note, that isn't necessarily a downside, is that the battery life taps out between the 2.5 - 3 hour mark. Which, is honestly pretty impressive for a computer you're essentially wearing on your face. To remedy this, we bought 15ft USB-C cables to plug in while we play. Can be a bit cumbersome, but, it comes in hand when you're 5-hours deep in a game.

We love it, could have gotten by with the smaller one. Downloading games is super fast and the immersion is awesome. Only flaw is the battery life but adding an external battery fixed the short coming. Gave 4 star due to battery and head strap. Overall very happy with the quest 2.

It is so awesome! So realistic its like you're there. The only drawback is the price of some of the games. It was so cool to do the tours of cities I'll probably never have the chance to see like Rome and New York.  Very cool. Overall I think it was a good choice for a vr headset.

The Occulus is great and is fairly intuitive. The only major complaint is pairing it with a computer. We tried multiple computers and were unable to link. At one point we received a message that we needed a hard line connection. Many newer computers don’t even have Ethernet ports.

So I was very hesitant to purchase the Oculus 2 specifically because of the tie ins with having to have a Facebook account. However, the product itself is fantastic. I can't believe in my lifetime (I am 45) how far VR has come. It is fun to use and will tie in to your PC as well.

This was a surprise birthday gift for my son.  Said it was the best present he’s ever received. Guess I need to rethink future gifts. Not sure if I can top this one...and what’s wrong with all the other birthday gifts???!!!  Apparently it topped the IPhone 10 from last year!  Lol

As a happy owner of the PSVR, I can say the Oculus Quest 2 blows it out of the water. I debated for a very long time, whether or not to buy an Oculus since I had a VR gaming system already. When I thought it through logically, PSVR is a gaming experience, the Oculus Quest is a total VR experience! You can enjoy and do everything with it that you could possibly imagine. The only problem I have with it is the fact that my youngest stepdaughter isn’t able to use it comfortably. Sadly she is 8 years old and her head is too small for the headset itself. If they were to sell some sort of attachment or adapter to compensate for that fact, I would happily buy it and there would be absolutely NO NEGATIVITY with this at all. I would highly recommend anyone who is considering buying this, bite the bullet and go for it. You will not be sorry. I do have to say, the major pro in favor of the PSVR is there is a larger game library than there is for the Oculus. Although, they are adding more games (seemingly) every week!

I’ve never had a VR headset but I can say that it is definitely worth the buy. I do however regret buying the larger storage. After I bought all the games I wanted I still was nowhere near the lower storage options maximum. Save the hundred bucks and put it into some extra games!

This is awesome I was hoping to get it by Christmas but it was sold out so I'm glad I waited till it was back in stock again it was well worth the wait really enjoy this I'm happy that I received it it came at a wonderful time no problem with the shipping everything was wonderful

We love the Oculus. We bought it for my son's birthday, and I feel like I'm the one who plays it the most. Beat Saber can give you a pretty good workout if you play on hard or expert and play it for 30 minutes or more. I can't wait for them to continue to expand the game options.

Fantastic headset.  Moved from PSVR to Quest 2 and absolutely love this headset. It is amazing to have the untethered experience.  Very easy to set up.and user friendly, everything you need is in the box.  Do yourself a favor if you're on the fence and grab yourself one of these.

I got this for my boyfriend as a birthday gift. He absolutely loves it. I’ve never seen a grown man more excited to show his friends something. Also, if you’re into golf—this is a great system for you. It’s expensive but worth every penny. Truly like no other gaming experience!!

The Quest 2 is amazing - fantastic speed, no buffering, no hitches - it is so realistic you can get scared of heights and even nauseous - has a couple of software problems with interfacing with a pc/mac but I  am sure those will get ironed out - also some issues deleting content

I love the product. I also have a Rift and was disappointed when I found out that all the numerous purchases I made for my Rift, wouldn't carry over for the Quest. Overall, it performs great and it's portable, so I can take it anywhere and even user my hotspot to play if needed.

Being new to VR I wasn't quite sure what to expect. Quest 2 takes you deep into places and delivers an immersive experience. I've barely scratched the surface of what it can deliver and am looking forward to many more interesting surprises. I would highly recommend this product.

This is hands down the best way to play vr games
tons of games on the oculus library
can play vr games completely wireless no pc required
doubles as a great pc vr head set as well
capable of playing pc vr games wirelessly with research
i use this device daily and it is amazing !

Anyone wanting to get into vr and just be a casual player this is definitely the way to go. Especially because if wanted to try pc games and have a powerful enough pc this is more that just a viable option with the resolution it provides. All I have to say is that it is amazing

Brought for gift for husband. He likes tech gagets but didn’t think much of it. After a month he came to me out of the blue & thanked me for the Oculas stating he can’t believe how much he is enjoying it and really loves it. Graphics are amazing and games are reasonably priced.

A definite upgrade from the Oculus 1. No screen door effect. Much much longer controller battery life. Smaller and lighter. There are so many great applications for this product. My only complaint is the included foam face pad is not very comfortable and lets in too much light.

If you have a gaming PC you must get the Link Cable. This VR is awesome. Super easy to setup and use. The oculus store is easy to navigate and purchase games. I made the mistake of buying the 256g version with a pc you don’t need that just go with the 64g version and save 100.

Great product. Games are fun (although some are really short)   hooking up to the pc can get u longer higher quality games but of course you need a pc capable of that.  Highly suggest a new strap makes it much more comfortable and easier for adjustments between multiple users.

This was THE Christmas gift and the morning of, followed the instructions and it was “corrupted” and didn’t work. I know I’m probably in the minority (statistical malfunctions out of the box) but very frustrating especially since they’re all sold out and can’t get it replaced.

Love this so much we’re buying another one.  If you are looking for gaming fun and dont want to have to store tons of games and equipment this is the way to go. Also love that we can show what we are seeing in our me TV or iPad so friends but playing can still join in the fun.

My wifes grandparents got one of these (Quest 1) i absolutely loved it. So finally being able to buy my own was liberating. It super form fitting has plenty of games for all types of gamer. Has 3rd party software that is free (Sidequest) and overall very fun. Highly recommend.

This is my first upgrade since the Oculus Go.  It is light years better, the price is really a bargain for the experience.  If you have been waiting to get into VR until the technology goes up and the price goes down, your wait is over.  Just buy it, you won't be disappointed.

This is a nice all-in-one console, you don't really need a tv to play (unless you want to cast it) while playing, my kids really enjoying it. We need more songs for the beat saber though. Overall,  it's a great deal if your looking into vr world.

Planning to buy another one..

I wish it came with instructions. I’m learning by just doing things and trying to remember what I just did. I have the 256 and the 64 but I can’t figure out how to play a two player game at the same time. The graphics are great! You really feel like you’re on a roller coaster!

Build quality feels a bit cheap, usb c charge part can’t fully plug in and feels flimsy. Mandatory   Facebook account is required, those who care about privacy may wanna know.  Plus side, resolution is significantly higher.  New update includes wireless airlink which is nice.

Most fun in years! Run, don’t walk and go out and buy this gaming system/ experience. Santa bought it for our oldest daughter, but dad and several other family members continue to fight for playing time. Strongly recommend spending the extra money for the upgraded head strap.

Got for  my wife’s 30th bday and she absolutely loves it. She plays it at least 2-3 times a day when she’s not working. I’ve never played a VR system before and wow I’m throughly impressed! Got the 256 instead of the 128 cause they were sold out but glad I did! Great product!

It was a Christmas gift, 256 GB, my son was so excited, and when we started playing, left control jogging  stick,wasn't working,i ask for an exchange, i was going to get i3 today,i recived an email,saying that it was a delay, if i dont get it by 01-10-2022,im geting a refund

This is a really fun product to use for the entire family. The games are pricey for some of them but that is to be expected. It took me some time to get used to what buttons to use when but as an adult, I'm not a "gamer". My son, who is 16, loves it and uses it all the time.

Love it. I’m not a kid but having so much fun with touring the world and playing games to music (beat saber et al). Fitness games are mild because you really only track your head & hands. But still more activiythan taking a walk. Totally makes me smile and worth every penny.

It's nice to add. Gives a different perspective on games. As time goes on more content will be added. I like watching the YouTube videos that are in 360. So far I have been playing ping pong. The thing I don't like about is it is not comfortable. It is not eyeglass friendly.

I need more than 5 stars. The Quest 2 isn't perfect but it is amazing and more so than ever before brings VR to the masses. It is highly immersive, easy-to-use, free of PCs, and reasonably priced. We have two now and are encouraging all of our friends and family to get them.

Changing the playing field for VR gaming. Get the 256GB version these things can fill up fast if you get sucked into VR gaming.  Which you will.  Be aware that for a premium experience you'll want to spend some money on upgrades, but the stock headset is still very playable.

Maybe I could actually give a review if the product had actually arrived. I ordered on 11/30 - this was a Christmas present for my daughter. I got an email two days before Christmas saying deliver was delayed and it would arrive Monday, December 28, it still has not arrived.

Pretty amazing tech. Immersive and easy to work.  If you plan on doing any VR through your laptop, make sure to check to see if your graphics card is up to the task before you spend on the cable. Does not come with any decent apps or games so prepare to spend more to use it.

Love, Love this item. Fun to play with the family or alone. Still can't get over how my whole living room is transformed into a whole other place. You don't have to leave your couch if you want to travel anywhere in the world. This especially cool since we're in quarantine!

I had the oculus rift and I didn’t really notice a difference in graphics on the quest..however it is game changing without the wires. Battery life is good enough for the average vr long sessions. I haven’t even changed the batteries on the controllers yet! 

I’m satisfied.

My grandson absolutely loves his oculus game set. Takes it wherever he goes. I would definitely purchase it again. My caution to parents is make sure your children have plenty of room to play it. No more couch potatoes with this system. It’s a workout that they would enjoy.

Great product. I like that you can use it anywhere and that it has stationary boundaries. It has high frames all the time, which is good. You can use it even when the low life is on. The one thing that could be better is the tracking. The tracking is off when you look down.

The Oculus Quest 2 couldn’t have come at a better time for me, because I'm already an insider person, but this help me do activities. The most thing I love bout the Oculus Quest 2 is that it has sleek and comfortable design, intuitive controllers, and strong built-in audio.

The kids love it! Their friends love it! Secretly....I love it too! Being able to cast the screen so others can watch what the player is doing is very cool. I really am surprised how awesome the graphics are. There’s so many games and options. Standing & sit down games too.

My kid , grandkid,  loved this.  I tried it one time and was motion sick afterwards for 2 days.  Not during the game tho.  I wish I could live in the VR waiting area.  Its gorgeous.  The games are extremely affordable.  I was pleasantly surprised.   Very glad we bought it.

Fantastic console. Only thing I would complain about is the head strap. It’s a little uncomfortable after a while. Would definitely recommend buying a third party head strap. They’re way more comfortable and affordable. DO NOT buy the elite strap, It WILL break eventually.

Absolutely fun good picture some fun games to play my only issue was if you play games as much as I do you'll find yourself quickly disappointed because there's not that many games in the oculus store but if you don't mind playing some games repeatedly then it's a must buy

Works great, especially being standalone. Resolution is good. No screen door effect.
PCVR with virtual desktop works well wirelessly if your wireless lan in up to snuff.
The Facebook requirement is the only bummer, really. Hence the 4 stars. I don't like to be zucc forced.

I have had the original Oculus Quest since shortly after its release and it has been a joy. With that experience in mind I was eager to get my hands on the Quest 2 and it hasn't disappointed at all. Excellent VR headset with so many ways to enjoy. I would highly recommend!

I was forced into purchasing the Quest 2 because of how Oculus no longer is supporting the Oculus GO or RIFT.  I am not happy about having to purchase this one to continue to use an Oculus, so thanks Facebook for that.  At least this one was less expensive than the Rift...

Not many free options but purchased a few games that our family enjoyed for hours together. Sales person convinced to buy extras that definitely weren't needed, but the actual system is good.
Set up was throwing errors but after exiting everything and restarting it worked.

Bought this for a present for the hubby. Sold his xbox 1s the next day. This is a great product. Literally puts you right in the game. Many options to buy games or get games for free. And I prefer this than the standard system, at least with this you get physical activity.

I don’t like exercise, but the fitness ones make you think that your only playing a game and at the end you’ll have burned some calories, and gotten your heart rate up. All I can say is if you don’t owned one you should get one. I just love mines. It’s better than my wii.

Awesome device. Took a minute to get set up as I'm not that tech savvy. The whole family loves it now. Only downfall is that you have to use only 1 facebook account. Some games have an option for other profiles but most are only 1 player and it's attached to your account.

oculus quest 2 is fantastic and I am having so much fun.  I love the features.  I love the games.  I love the ease of use.  I had to buy one little headband adapter for 20$ and I bought the charger station for 80$  My 3 siblings love it.  We are looking at buying another.

Love this VR set!  PSVR was/is a great system, but the ability to go wireless with this system is a BIG PLUS.  Range of games is good, and setup is super easy.  Only dislike is the requirement for Facebook login, but if you can get beyond that, this is an awesome system!!

Really versatile and fun portable VR solution. The controllers in particular are well done. Reaching and grabbing things in a virtual world has never felt so real. Alot of titles are fun here. Get the link cable and hook it up to a gaming rig to really enjoy high end VR!

Got this for my son for Christmas and he loves it. He had some trouble getting the wifi to work at first but after that he loves it. We've all had some fun with it and he already purchased several games with his Christmas money. So make sure you're able to buy the games.

Love the OC..it's good for games, videos, workouts, socializing and more. Hate that you have to use Facebook login to use it, but that's a minor pain.  It doesnt' have very good battery time, which is a big pain and I didn't want tethered or I would've bought the PS one.

So fun! My husband and i aren’t tech folks nor do we know how to play video games but this was a good buy for us. It doesn’t seem to hold charge very long and that’d be my only complaint. It’d be nice if her more than 30 min of time to play so I deducted a star for that.

I got this to replace my Rift S. I’m strictly a PC gamer, mostly flight and driving sims. But unfortunately the connection for the Link cable kept falling out from simply turning my head. This made this unit completely unusable for my needs, so back to the Rift S for me.

Easy to use really wonderful device can’t can’t say enough about it the games are fun you can even put it with your steam account VR from there!

I’m an old man and I really love playing it beat saber is the best game and even gives me a little exercise for my arthritis

It's great. It's surprisingly easy to use. Set up was a breeze. It guides you every step of the way. SUpport was amazing too. All it needs now is a bigger apps library and more digital content. It'll get there, eventually. But what a great piece of machine worth having.

Purchased for my granddaughter for Christmas.  She is very happy playing Oculus Quest 2.  One problem is the charging cable is shorter than the Oculus Quest, about 3 feet which makes it impossible to play while charging.  Other than that she is very happy with her gift.

Only issue I had was I get motion sick easy and a couple games messed me up pretty good, but that’s a me issue not product issue. It’s solidly built and easy to set up. Beat saber, super hot, and the Vader eternal games are a lot of fun. My nieces and nephews loved it.

Best Christmas gift for teenagers. It is very another option from Oculus that you don’t have to connect with PC. The graphics is very good and I tried it myself... just feel so real and enjoy the games. Battery life last about 2-3 hrs without getting the extra battery.

I never thought I would actually say that something blows my mind, but it does!  I am still adjusting to getting it to fit just right on my head, but I have to say I am really enjoying it! Just doing the practice thing...dancing with the little robot makes me smile. :)

Got this for my husband and it’s an AMAZING purchase!! The only thing that left us a little disappointed was that there were not many games to choose from and some were more cartoonish than realistic. Jurassic park for example was not as realistic as we would’ve liked.

Hated it because of facebook login, lot of games but not that great. no bluetooth for headphones. need elite strap  to stay put in your head. I enjoyed it for 2 hours and gave it to my 8 yr old son. I hope there will be streaming from phone/ipad to quest in the future.

great safety features, so you don't destroy household items,
 ALL in one VR headset no cables needed other then to charge,
CHILD friendly adult friendlier.. Do yourself a favor and pick one up..
 its great for the family and  the experience is nothing less then amazing

Truly an immersive gaming experience, and I consider myself a causal gamer.  I bought this for my kids, but I end up using it a lot more than anticipated.  

Don't like the fact you have link your Facebook account even if you have a separate Oculus account from before.

The Oculus is more realistic than I ever thought it would be. The little vibrations and sounds blend perfectly with the visual effects to create a fun gaming experience. The only downside is that it can be a bit uncomfortable to have on for an extended period of time.

I am not a fan of VR stuff, but I bought it for my son for Christmas. So far my only major complaint about it is getting things adjusted correctly so that you can avoid the blur. Even with the eyeglass spacer insert it can be a pain in the butt if you wear spectacles.

The new Oculus Quest 2 Virtual Reality VR Headset is a significant improvement on its predecessor. More importantly, however, it creates an all-in-one best VR system system that's truly worth buying and it’s fun for the family and kids. Keep in mind it requires wi-fi.

My husband got the original oculus quest. Now we both can play. Unfortunately we haven’t figured out how to play together on any game but epic roll coaster. We are working on synth rider and echo vr. It is a lot more work than I thought but I think it will be worth it

Got this for my fiance' so that we will both have a Quest VR headset. The latest headset seems lighter than the original and the processor is a little better. Definitely recommend the 256GB so that you're worry-free on downloading as many apps as you'll probably want.

Oculus Quest 2 Virtual Reality Headset is a very cool product.  Easy to set up and begin play.  Crazy good fun for all ages.  We've had teens to elders and all in between trying it out!  So far, so good, and very happy with the purchase as it's been very entertaining.

This is the best Virtual Reality head set that I’ve ever experienced. I had the Samsung crazy head set that was very glitchy and heated up my s8 galaxy phone to almost burning it out. I love that you do not need a phone for this Oculus Quest 2. It truly is standalone.

We love our Oculus and have so much with it!!! Beat Saber is my personal favorite although I have enjoyed all of the games so far! I think at least a game or two should be included with the device since you’re already paying so much for it, other than that we love it!

This product dope tbh ! First time copping a VR & im impressed . Wish it was more Apple Product friendly but its all good . Played Creed Boxing VR & got a hell of a workout . Fat boy was sweating bullets. Now all they need is a Ready Player One type of VR & im hooked.

I used to have the psvr and i had fun but the cables were always in the way and sometimes the tracking was off.
I haven’t has problems with tracking with the oculus and it has no cables!! Also the amount of games and games with multiplayer with friends are amazing!!!

Love the Oculus Quest 2! We were hesitant to get this for our son, but it actually gets him off of the couch and he’s sweating by the end with all the active games he plays. He loves Gorillla Tag and we also love the fitness games. Great way to work out and have fun!

Excellent product, and the software is getting better every day with more multiplayer games.

I hate sitting on the couch and playing games -- I get bored quickly.

The games on the Oculus Quest 2 are fun, highly interactive, and I get a good workout at the same time

Put it on and went thru the learning steps . Saw it was REALLY a simulated environment . The next day I went to the ISS . Fun floating around .  THEN  my Heart really had a missed beat when I went for a space walk and was looking down at EARTH  while floating there .

The graphics are way better than the original, and its even more immersive.
Just be aware, the black in the display, doesnt get pitch black (because the type o display)

But overall great product, bought the 256 version, so i wont have to change or uninstall any game

We got 2 of these, one for me and one for my sister.  We love them.  The games are comfortable, and the images are amazing.   I can spend hours in one sitting playing games.  I wish the games weren’t so expensive or came with a couple good ones but we love it so far!

The system is great.  No games are provided for the whopping $500 cost which is not cool.  The headset is very front heavy and has to be constantly adjusted for focus.  Not for long term playing as the headset is quite heavy and you may get nauseous or light headed.

My son deffinetly loved this for Christmas as he’s been wanting it a few years now. Only reason I didn’t give a five star is this. For how much you are paying for this it should deffinetly come with a case, not one tou have to buy. Other than that happy 11 year old!

I bought this for my teenage son who is 13. He previously had just a VR headset that the phone fits in. He absolutely loves this VR headset and how he doesn't have to be wired into anything. We're still figuring how to hook up to Steam, but all in all this is great.

Awesome experience. Need to adjust the head straps properly to really enjoy all of the games. The software could be a little overwhelming but navigating through it all can be fun. It definitely takes some time getting used to all of the different things you can do .

My son loves the VR headset. It's allowing him to be more active and interacting with friends on line while being stuck at home versus planted at his PC gaming.  We're blessed to be able to afford this. 

My husband enjoys it as well.  I haven't tried it myself yet.

I love it. My family loves it. It's a lot of fun, and packs a bunch of power in such a small form factor. I had a Playstation Vr and it doesn't even come close. Not only that, but you can connect it to your computer and run pcvr games. Highly recommend this headset.

We got these for the household for Christmas.  They were a great hit.  The graphics are amazing.  We haven't bought games yet but there are free games already available.  The kids were up super late playing on them..  I would totally recommend this VR set.  AMAZING

Have been waiting for something like this to come along, it’s fabulous. I don’t play video games I just use it for fun and exercise. The more I learn about it the better it gets. Plenty of free stuff to keep me entertained. I’m a woman in my mid 60’s and I LOVE it!

Bought as a eary christmas gift to myself. I have been wanting one for years and I must say it was the best item ever bought! Its so much fun and has so many things you can do. Never a dull moment. The head stap fits well and feel comfortable.  I have no complains.

The screen quality is not there yet.  Can only watch about 10-15 minutes and then it starts to hurt your eyes.  It doesn’t work well with people who wear glasses either.  My spouse wears glasses and really couldn’t enjoy it at all.  For me, it just didn’t work out.

Absolutely love it. Still trying to get used to the VR world. Keep getting motion sickness. The only issue I have is that the battery dies very quickly. Even if it’s 100% charged and not on, if I go to play it a couple of days later, the battery is completely dead.

Astounding. 3D and VR has come a long way. This version is lightweight. It has a pretty good battery life and the controllers are light and comfortable.  I love that I can develop my own games and videos and load them directly to the device via APKs. Gotta love it.

This device is so much fun. Avid gamer I try to obtain all popular consoles but this is in its own league. It all depends on what you like. I’ve found free apps and videos that keep me entertained for hours.  And games like Star Wars stories are really fun to play.

I am severely impressed with this VR.  You absolutely get lost in the game.  The only thing I wish I knew is the battery life is not good.  But I think this is a good thing because by the time the battery dies (about an hour) it should be time to out the game down.

Great VR system. We have used this with the downloadable games from oculus as well as linked to a gaming pc to play games life Half Life Alyx. The controls are super responsive. The resolution is really clear. The battery life lasts long enough for a good session.

I love this thing so much! I have a gaming pc and I thought about getting the rift s but I’m glad I waited and got the quest. Prepare to sweat with this thing. I recommend buying another face cover so you won’t swap sweat if this will be played by multiple people.

We love it!We downloaded Ritchie 's plank experience, even though I am on the ground, I couldn't walk it cause I felt like I was really there and scared me so much!! Its a lot of fun! The other games are great too! It was worth the money!! We got the quest 2 model

The face mask it self does not sit the way I pictured. I can still seen through the bottom of the headset. The eyes need more adjustment sighting. Makes me dizzy with motion sickness. This is with min the warning label. Over all I like the one game in always play.

I had the oculus Go which was terrific but this blows it out of the water! Easy to setup and to use very much worth it... I chose the 256 gb version so I Would have plenty of room to store content. I shoot 360 video and this a great way to share those experiences!

Not to bad of a experience, getting the eye viewer right and set on your head is a pain but once you get it set its not bad. I recommend the extra battery head strap but be careful its flimsy plastic and can break. Plus its way better then the stap it comes with.

I bought this for my wife as a Christmas gift because she has been wanting to play on one for a while now. Its super easy to setup and install everything for the computer to work with steam directly it was well worth the buy we both have been having a blast on it

This one is for me. I love this item, I being somewhat disabled can actually go visit places, see awesome animals, swim with the sharks, and let's not forget play Fruit Ninja. I am Extremely satisfied with this purchase, and Best Buy has the best Price out there!

This one is more comfortable than the regular strap, but with the news of it breaking on people and having no earphones attached I returned it and got the vive pro audio strap and deadeye vr adapters off amazon which work perfect and is a little more comfortable.

These are the most comfortable goggles yet on the Oculus quest 2. You feel like your actually in the space of the your in. Definitely a must have and i know if i were 12 again I'd want this for Christmas for sure. Ty Oculus Quest 2. Definitely worth every dollar.

My grandson loves it - uses it everyday
Small getting used to adjusting headset to individual's own eyes and vision.
Also have to wipe eyepieces frequently with glasses or camera lens type cleaner cloth to remove prints and dirt.
Very easy setup vi cell phone app

This is really awesome . virtual experience and its reality that is great on movies, games and the amount of things you can do ride in a helicopter, sky dive, fish ,  Holiday world , dollywood , the rollercoasters and the boat tours its neverending  well worth it

This thing is too much fun! My wife and I each got our own can we play games together. The only problem with it is it is kind of a time sucker. We have to set an alarm clock so we don’t spend too much time on it. It is very immersive. This particular one needs no computer, everything is built-in. The only big drawback to it in all seriousness is the expense of the games and apps. The machine was $400 itself and came with no games or apps to speak of. There are some free stuff that you can get. A fishing game that’s a lot of fun and variousOther things but if you want to get any decent games look at forking out at least 20 bucks per game. Our favorite so far as a zombie game where we can team up and just blast zombies for hours.
I would highly recommend this to anybody. We are 53 years old and we have a ton of fun. I know it’s not just the games. You can go traveling without ever leaving your house. You can immerse yourself in oceans or deserts or jungles.
Start out slow though you can get a little motion sickness from it.

Best Electric Device I've purchased. It's my first VR device and I am glad that I did. Only had it a few days, but no issues so far.
Set up was easy. Tried the Immortal Vader game, 1st episode. Was fantastic, though not long enough. Can't wait to get other games.

Best Electric Device I've purchased. It's my first VR device and I am glad that I did. Only had it a few days, but no issues so far.
Set up was easy. Tried the Immortal Vader game, 1st episode. Was fantastic, though not long enough. Can't wait to get other games.

I love that you can use this stand alone, or connected to your computer for the best of both worlds.   

I'm really unhappy that you're required to link your quest app to a Facebook account.   I bought this for my kid who doesn't have or want a Facebook account.

Is definitely more comfortable to wear for long periods of time over the first gen Quest.  Picture quality is much improved. They say the black levels are not as good, due to not being an OLED screen, but my eyes must not be sensitive enough to see a difference.

No other way to say it, this device is amazing, as long as your expectations are reasonable.   By reasonable, I mean don't expect PS4 graphics on a 4k screen for resolution.  Graphics wise, it displays like an early 2010 home console.  Graphics are good enough, it's the world this puts you in, it's the fact you don't have to cable it up to a high end PC, the ease of setting up boundaries so you don't hurt yourself while immersed in the game, the controls that feel so natural, the very reasonable cost, and the game library (If you don't purchase Walking dead, you're really missing out).  I have one complaint about this device, and it's an obvious one... The included head strap is so uncomfortable that I can't use it more than 10 minutes.  I'm not deducting a star because I feel this was such a great deal for what it offers you.  I'd rather have paid $50-$100 more and had a really comfortable head strap.   The Elite Strap is available as an accessory, and for me, it's a must have, because I wouldn't even use this without it.

Amazing Oculus Quest 2 performances unmatched 
With also Crystal Clear graphics and visuals, experiences exciting new and breathtaking. I would have to say all no this was a great Buy highly recommended to anyone. The Best gaming experience I've ever experienced

Are you like me, in that you have a PC that's crap at handling VR? Do you want to not spend much money just to experience 6DOF VR? What if you have a great PC but want to experience the best of both worlds? The Oculus Quest 2 is a fantastic HMD for such things. If you plan to use this as a standalone experience like I have so far, I recommend the 256GB model. The only complaints I have is that you NEED a facebook account to set this up, and dummy/tossaway accounts will brick the headset. For someone like me whose had a Facebook account for a while, this wasn't much a big deal for me, since i rarely use FB nowadays. I also recommend getting the elite strap. The headstrap that comes with the headset is garbage. Without the elite strap, It is uncomfortable. Besides Zuckerberg's thirst of data, and the included headstrap that creates more headaches than it needs to be, this is a great headset if you want to experience VR without breaking the bank, or if you have a good PC and want to experience PCVR on the cheaper side of life

Most incredible experience! Great entertainment! 
Had to purchase better headset as the one that comes with it doesn’t fit right!
Games are a little pricey but cheaper than home game systems. 
Any glitches or questions we’ve had, we have been able to find online

Very fun, friends and family love it as well. Quality is actually amazing inside the headset and it doesn't hurt my head most of the time. Games take up little storage and they're cheaper compared to games on other platforms. The portable-ness is the best part.

My first vr headset, and it's amazing. I doubt you can get the quality of what this technology has to bring for the price. Highly recommend it. I bought the 256gb because you will definitely need it! Has no sd slot so go for the bigger storage. Won't regret it.

I had never used VR before, I can see 3D comfortably for the first time because I can wear my glasses. The quest even comes with a space just for glasses wearing people. My whole family enjoys using it for different games, and all of us are enjoying Beat Saber.

Wow, plays all the rift and steam games- wireless  A plus games like half life alyx, saints and sinners, Has developer mod to play other games.
Bad side: head set is heavy and takes a bit to get a nice fit- quest 3 announced all ready, Facebook account required

This unit is incredible for the money.  I wear glasses but don't need to wear them when playing with this unit.  I definitely can lose track of time playing this game for hours because it is so fun.  I recommend this especially for the money and game selection.

The smoothness of motion is incredible. The range of apps and games is less than I expected, but growing. The setup of your VR safe zone is very well thought out. It has tiny speakers which are surprisingly good, but you can also plug in earbuds (no Bluetooth).

Kids have used this since they got it.  It is fun for the whole family once you start getting some games.  Fit is good, battery life is good and so far storage is fine.
Gave 4 stars because I wish it would have came as a package with more of the popular games.

Great fun! Love being wireless! And still be able to play wired as well. Nice to have the option. Battery only lasts about 2.5 hours unplugged. Disappointed the elite headband isn’t the standard one. Would still give 5 stars if Facebook link wasn’t required...

Meta knocked it out of the park with this VR headset that will likely change the future of VR revisions from Valve and HTC.
Great VR experience with no cables, comfortable controllers and plenty of accessory options for further comfort and longer battery life.

It’s really amazing , with infinite interesting options like any kind of games  with very accessible prices, documentaries, etc, where your personal immersion is fantastic. Recommended to play for half an hour with alternative breaks.
My whole family loves it!

Really cool experience. Should get better as developers start making more games for it. Easy for novice tech users but will be slightly challenging for older parents who have never played video games or are active with tech. If you help them they will love it.

Amazing and so much fun! Easy to use. Easy to set up. No wires. Highly recommend. I am someone that used PSVR, and wow, what an upgrade. Mainly using for games, but there is much more you can do with the Quest 2. Option to hook up to a pc make it even better.

Fantastic purchase. VR instructions can be tricky, especially for casting, but the quality is great, and with the speakers so close it really draws your senses away from reality and pulls you into a different world. Truly a unique experience. Love this thing.

I went from the Quest 1 to this headset - the Quest 2. I like it much more than the Quest 1. 

It is lighter, the batteries on my controllers still haven’t needed to be replaced, the resolution and graphics are better and it’s more comfortable. It’s a winner!

Very fun console, you can play online with friends and hear them through the mic on the headset. You have to pay for the cooler games ($20-$40) there are some free games. The charge does not hold well, I ended up buying an extended battery pack from wal mart.

Love the Oculus and the customer service we received when we had a slight problem
With the upgrade. My husband wanted to upgrade to the higher gigabyte oculus. 
The person I spoke to on the phone was kind and very helpful! 
Would totally recommend this store!

During these times when being locked in the house seems to be the new normal oculus gives you that break from the reality and stress of daily life. This device makes it simple to disconnect your normal routine and also allows you to be active in the process.

I really enjoy using my Quest for Exercising and for just Fishing around! The view is amazing and relaxing. Even watching YouTube videos becomes a new experience. No movie theater? No problem, you can watch them on a movie screen in your own home. I love it.

Helpful people at best buy. Was able to get this VR headset with ease. Didn't see any in the case at the store but asked up front and they were able to grab me a pair from the back. Very helpful advice as well. Thanks to the team at Gilbert San Tan Best Buy.

I purchased the Oculus Quest 2 after trying my grand son-in-law’s a couple of weeks ago.  We have so much family fun, it is fairly user friendly and such a wide variety of entertainment, exercise & educational activities. The entire family can use and enjoy!

My first foray into VR and I love it! While I can't compare this to other VR experiences, I can say it's a whole ton better than Wii. From working out to dancing to puzzle solving, adventures, and shooters... I bought a little bit of everything to start out.

Portable and compatible with PC via Air Link or Oculus Link (recommended). Can also be used to watch Netflix on the go (local wifi network required) as well as using VRChat and BigScreen to chat with other users and to turn your desktop into a cinema screen.

I never really knew what VR was capable of. Until I bought this. My wife has vision issues and had a hard time with balance, but she loved it for the time she played, minus her headache. Great Value for the money and the Geek Protection makes it all worth it

This wasn't first VR headset and so it surprised me to find out that it isn't as clear as you'd think. But the experience is still amazing and absolutely worth it. Tracking is weird sometimes but cna be easily fixed by turning on the lights in my room. 9/10

Pre ordered this for day of release. After having this for awhile now I can say it’s incredible value for money and will def blow anyone away with how much fun this little thing is. Make sure you turn on 90Hz in the settings for less motion related sickness

Not very durable plastic build and design. The overall quality of the screen /what you look at is pretty disappointing. Onward is about the only fun game. Not worth purchasing the upgraded storage version as you won’t find enough entertaining games to play.

it's a wonderful system. the reality within the headset is amazing. It really is ALL-IN-ONE, just have to setup with an account and buy a game. Only thing is playing time shouldn't be more than an hour without some rest, it does make my head spin for a bit.

Really awesome experience. Strap could be a little better but it works. The games are really cool. My biggest complaint is that the side arms have a cloth type fabric and it's gets dirty really easy. Have to try not to grab that part, but the body instead.

Amazing product having a lot of fun with it.
It’s meant for my kids but now I’m playing it I own the original developer oculus and this by far is much better 
The motion sickness issue that I use to see with the earlier model you not the same with this one

We were only able to play it 1x and that was Christmas.  I bought this for my boys for christmas. They played it Christmas.  Tried to play it again 2 weks later the battery was dead. Charged it. Went to play it after the charge. The battery was dead again.

VR has always been fun to use, but it has come a long way from the beginning. The Oculus - Quest 2 has so many uploads, from entertainment to working out to education. I highly recommend this, and even the price is good. Get one, you will be happy you did.

One should know this requires a Facebook account. I tried to delete Facebook recently and in the process they made clear I would no longer be able to use the Oculus. I bought this in December and have played maybe five times. I now regret my purchase.

I would not recommend buying anything from Oculus!
I had there last Gen VR headset and its a BRICK after just 2 years.
their customer service says they no longer support that device.
Their only advice was "factory reset" (which didn't work) and good luck.

I enjoy using the Oculus Quest 2 256GB.  I am happy that I purchased the Quest 2, I have wanted one for the longest time.  I am still learning how to use it. Only bad thing about it is the price. If I had the money I would buy one for each of my siblings.

Excellent Product !!  Given the opportunity, I will not hesitate to recommend this product to friends and family.  Ii sure to provide moments of excitement and pleasure to users.  I would not hesitate to purchase future products of similar functionabilty.

I love my Quest 2. The biggest problem with VR sets is finding a compatible computer. Although the Quest is free of needing a computer, you still need it for Steam games and business software. 

It's like being in another world for a short period of time.

I am beyond pleased with this purchase . I was a bit skeptical about how much i would enjoy it. I was WRONG. It’s awesome. The technology is incredible . It takes you step by step on how to use it. Overall, this is a fantastic, money well spent, purchase.

Once you explore with VR, it’s hard to play regular gaming systems.  This is my favorite item to do workouts with and play various games.  Doesn’t need any other items to connect like a PlayStation, etc with all the cords.  A great investment in gaming!!!

A good system! Worth the money!
A good system! Worth the money!
A good system! Worth the money!
A good system! Worth the money!
A good system! Worth the money!
A good system! Worth the money!
A good system! Worth the money!
