Good VR headset for casual gameplay. Battery life is kind of short, 2 hours kind of flies by when you’re having fun. I don’t like that you have to have a Facebook account, but what do you expect from a FB device.

I upgraded from my Oculus Quest to the Quest 2 today.   I don’t regret it even the slightest bit.   All around a better headset.  Better Graphics, better sound, better comfort, and it runs a lot smoother as well.

My wife purchased for my birthday. Decent VR easy to setup and play. Lots of different apps/games. Only downside is that batteries die fast, depends on what apps your running though. You can get a good 2hrs play.

We bought this VR for our grandson fir Christmas. We did not know what it was. Once he let us play a game we went out the next day and bought us one. We are having so much fun and quality time with our grandson.

I like the VR but I wish there were more games that were available. I love horror games, but I Find that there are not enough of them for the VR. Either way using the VR is fun. My 2 son's really enjoy using it.

Better resolution and comfort.. but the headband is a necessity. The straps do not feel great and that should be your first purchase. Another thing is yes. EVERYTHING on this headset requires a facebook account!

Amazing device! But it sucks that you must have a Facebook account, it's tied to it. So if you get locked out of Facebook for whatever reason you lose access to your Oculus. Google this for detailed information.

Pretty awesome product.  Very fun and enjoyable.  If you are looking for VR this one rocks.  The Occulus is nice.   Must have a Facebook account and in good standing with FB to use this item as they own Occulus.

my only disappointment  is you have to spend another 300.00 for additional accessories ie. headband, face cushion, and snap in prescription lenses (if you wear glasses) once your all set up it is great graphics.

Ive been having my eyes on these things for a while then i forgot about them but then my friend got one then remembered about them now working hard to get some￼.            Ps my friend says the quality is good.

Doesn't work without a Facebook Account Login, and that is broken half the time. I want nothing to do with overly political Social Media, and I refuse to use equipment that forces me to do anything! Total Trash!

My kids love it, i love it. The only thing i didnt realize and didnt like is that it's linked up to facebook. I had to create a family facebook account for us to use this. (I dont like how invasive facebook is)

My son LOVES this system. He plays daily with friends - and is the main way he is staying in contact with his peers at this time. It is also keeping him somewhat active, as many games have a physical component!

Great product for the value. If you’re just starting looking into VR, this is the headset for you. Consider getting a better strap though, the stock one will do, but it gets a little less comfortable over time.

This thing is awesome!  Was really impressed with the video quality.  Would be 5 stars if I didn’t have to buy a chrome cast so we can watch on tv.  Wish there was longer than a two hour trial period for games.

Nice product, the app to load games is hard to navigate. Needs for options. I never had a Facebook account, never wanted a Facebook account but was forced to create an account just to be able to use the product

This is a great product!! I have used it daily it daily to enjoy time with family that owns the product to. Games are fun some free and some not. But the best news was I lost 5 lbs doing exercise to beat saber.

Love love love the oculus it does not disappoint. If I could have any issue it would be the cost of the additional games. My family enjoys it only problem is we need one of two more. Wish there was a combo pack

I'm not a gamer by any means. However, the Quest 2 is Awesome!! You don't need to be game controller competent to play. I really enjoy putting on my headset and leaving reality, if even only for an hour or two.

The first time I got to try these I was hooked and couldn't wait until I got some of my owm!! I highly recommend going sky diving or wind surfing with them and don't get me started on the beat Saber. must have

easy set up and works great. I set up in less than an hour and we were playing right away. Hours of fun and we found a large room would be great but for safety you mark out play area every time large or small.

Clear and easy set up. Works with pc gaming with extra software. Battery life seems good. Kids enjoy it and have a lot of fun. Must be linked to Facebook so that isn't good, but so far that's the only drawback

This is absolutely amazing. I had the rift, but the quest with no wires and the ability to see in the room without taking the headset off is great! I highly recommend this to anyone looking at getting into VR!

This was a present for my teenage son, so far it's been great. I don't give the 5 start due to the battery life. It's the only thing is a bit challenging with the device since it takes a long time to recharge

bought four of these for christmas my family is in love. The only bad thing is you can't play each other if you share the same app. Otherwise might have to buy multiple games if you have more than one oculus.

Great product! Extreamly Fun! Not good for anyone who get motion sickness. The only problem i had with it was battery life but does charge pretty fast. Will look forward to buying a portable battery for this.

Overall easy to use, fun to play and super addictive. Only thing I would say is the 256gb, for my 2 sons at least, is way more than enough space. I could’ve saved some money by purchasing the smaller HD size.

Amazing! Bought this for the great exclusive titles like Beat Saber and Vader Immortal! 

No need to turn on a console or PC! So practical! I’m taking this with me on the holidays for all my siblings to play!

This is out of this world the coolest, realistic, mind blowing VR on the market! It also doubles for me as a workout aspect in my life. The only thing I would change is the color, white is hard to keep clean.

I am finally loving this with the virtual desktop software update directly from Oculus at no cost to the end user.
Clear a 15’x15’ area and let the kids have some fun. Our wifi reaches the backyard as an fyi.

It is a great device and the games are not that expensive. The headset is a little bulky but overall play makes it worth it. Got it for the kids for Christmas and they have played it every day and so has Mom!

Love it the only issues I have is the battery life and the foam around the glasses. It also makes you use your Facebook account which is understandable since it's owned by Facebook but wish you didn't have to

The oculus quest is awesome. The hands free nature and price are awesome for a quality car experience. While a gaming pc and link cable are needed for large gaming experiences this keeps the option available.

I bought this for my boys (and myself) and we have absolutely loved it.  It feels comfortable wearing it, reacts smoothly and has brought us a tremendous amount of enjoyment, especially in a challenging year.

This is the best oculus yet and even though you still need a phone with the oculus app, you no longer have to attach it to the device, there are so many games and things to do, you never want to put it down

Still learning but studied the whole VR options for a couple of years. Once they became self sufficient thought it was time to try. So far so good. I am receiving all I was promised and my WiFi signal sucks.

Easy to set up and surpassed my expectations in graphical quality. My only problem being even with the glasses spacer and extending the strap, putting this VR headset with glasses on can prove to be a chore.

Absolutely hands down the best thing I got for my husband who’s obsessed with Star Wars! He bought the new games and LOVES it! He says the clarity on it is insane and he feels like he’s actually in the game.

I have fully enjoyed it, now 3 of my friends went and bought theirs too. The price is right for the product, I had a previous version of it and paid 700.00 for it, get the case for it. I highly recommend it.

We purchased this VR and everyone in the house fell in love with it. We now have three that we all appreciate and enjoy. A true bonus is a 15 day guarantee for app refunds provided you are quailed of course.

This device is great for the whole family! We bought my son one for his birthday. Everyone tried it out and loved it so much. My husband loved it so much he went out and bought his own not even a week later.

I really like this oculus, I like how much space there is on the console meaning I can get a bunch of games. I also love that it is completely wireless and done need a computer or other game console to work.

It's better than the Oculus Go which I never use any more.  It was immersive and higher resolution. But I could not get over the discomfort. They still weigh for too much and it is not a pleasant experience.

For a novice this is a pretty user-friendly unit. May need to invest in a headset. Sound travels behind the person & makes the room pretty loud when volume is turned up. Love the total immersion into the vr.

Great product, reasonably priced. It just sucks that they include a crappy strap with the original purchase instead of the improved strap which of course they charge an extra $50 for as an add on accessory.

Not a bad device save your money and get the lower priced less GB memory; having 256GB of memory is a bit excessive. It is a new item, higher priced, Christmas 2021 they should be more appropriately priced.

Awesome gift for my daughter and although I only got to try it once I could tell by the way she flipped out when she got it how great it really is! Her best friend had one and she had no idea it was coming.

Pretty cool, my daughter's are having fun with it.
My wife visited her home she grew up in Missouri from our living room in Brooklyn. Even losing some weight with the exercise app. 
Overall a good purchase.

Great visual quality almost looks 4k smooth 90 MHz refresh. Wide variety of games for whole family.built with High quality materials.  adjustable strap fits everybody in the House. Even Grandma was playing.

I purchased this on a humble, not knowing too much about the fun packed inside of the small box... It was the hit of the holidays! My family has spent ours enjoying many of the (purchased) downloaded games.

Accessories are disappointing. Best part is sideload apps and stream wireless from real PC or Does a great job on its own from the get go. Competes on overall scale with wired VR with headsets 2x this cost.

Son loves this one better than the rift he has due to it being wireless… only downside is the small clips on the back of the headset he says hurts his head but put foam around it to make it more comfortable

Purchased as a gift for my son. Great variety of games. The controls are easy to use. The stability of the head set feels balanced and comfortable. He loves it! Provides him with many entertainment options.

Wow. Just, wow. I was so blown away by the Oculus Go I bought a year or so ago and the Quest 2 makes the Go seem like a prototype. A truly amazing and affordable standalone option for VR. Highly recommend.

All i can say is WOW!!!  I originally bought this for my Daughter but I find myself using this a lot as well.  The device  very easy to setup and the VR emersion is incredible!  You won't be disappointed!!

I am so happy that I wait for the oculus quest 2 I was going to buy the earliest version the good thing that I wait a little bit longer the graphics are good sound quality is good and it’s very easy to use

It was a Christmas gift for my son that we both enjoy! This VR is awesome! Despite Facebook's BS and politics, as of now, this VR set is the best value on the market! The features and quality is top notch!

I love this thing. If you’re fine with using Facebook to login and want an easy vr experience then this is it. Great battery life, it’s cheaper than everything else and has many awesome games in its store.

I bought this headset back in march and my son has loved it! He does say that the headstrap is really uncomfortable though so that's where the 4 star comes from :(  Overall a really great product! Love it!

Great product that supplies ffun to thr entire family. I am new to the VR world, but my family is not. Had a great time finding things to do as a family together. I would definitely recommend to ant family

The product itself is as advertised and easy to learn. The only reason I can’t give it 5 stars is because I feel like they should have INCLUDED a few games as a part of the package but hey, I’m nitpicking!

A little challenging to get used to with my eyes but once that was taken care of (20 minutes) there hasn’t been an issue. From what I’ve seen, it has fantastic gameplay and is a great immersive experience.

Lots of fun. My daughter saved up her allowance for this and has never regretted the time it took for her to save up for this. She uses it all the time, to exercise, watch movies, or play with her friends.

One of the best vr headsets in the market with the best price! Great alternative to valve index and vive cosmos, except has inside out tracking which to some is not the best but is honestly very convenient

Amazing product.  The packaging was a bit underwhelming.  And it feels as if you need to upgrade the head strap and face cushion for it to fit 100% properly.  Overall, however, I'm happy with the purchase.

Our family is amazed. So far no problems. Had them since Xmas. Even at 41 yrs old I play and am just in awe over how they created such a thing. Lol. We love it. Hopefully I don't regret posting this later.

Amazing! Brings entertainment and training to a new level. I purchased for my son to primarily use for baseball training but also has numerous games and apps that will keep us entertained for a long time.

Totally amazing! This has been fun for the whole family! It's easy to use I do with the straps were made out of something different. The kids get on this and sweat a lot ...then the strap is wet... gross.

This is fun, and it's nice to have something new to do. It's a bit heavy to wear, though. The Rift was more comfortable to wear, but the trade-off is this one is cordless. Can't have everything - yet :-).

Super fun to use, be weary if you have big glasses, could need some adjusting to properly fit and see good. dont wear for too long will strain eyes. also is your casting onto tv, will drain battery faster

I love my new Oculus Quest 2. It has so much memory and lets not forget the processor is amazing. Great graphics and fabulous hand tracking capabilities.  I give the Quest 2, 10 out of 5 stars hands down.

The Oculus - Quest 2 Advanced All-In-One Virtual Reality Headset - 256GB is a whole new life experience.  I can't stress enough how worth it this purchase was.  I highly recommend it to just about anyone!

Bought for my 48 year old father and he loves it! He dropped the normal consoles and has completely dedicated a lot of his free time (which is not much so very valuable) to playing this. Great experience.

This is a well made and fun console my kids 11-18 have enjoyed it very much and have used it a lot. I took one star off because some games are not that great and the variety of games is still very limited

I bought for my son as a Christmas gift. I had so much fun I plan to buy one. The only drawback is you need a Facebook account. I purposely remain off social media so that is why I gave 4 stars and not 5.

This order was great my second order that was cancelled on the day of pick up after being notified to pick it up was b******* because it was a Christmas gift I will never purchase anything from here again

It’s so light weight and love the games it was easy to navigate we all had a blast using them even the baby he couldn’t wait to play and the fact that when they are playing I get my tv I love it even more

I’ll keep it short and simple it’s like a journey into another world. You essentially get to partake in so many crazy, scary, or funny scenarios that are either hard to find in real life or never come by.

Awesome super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super super cool

Purchased this for my 14 year old.  Since I don't use it, I asked him to review.  Here is his review:  "This is a good item I have a lot of fun with friends and playing games. I play it almost everyday".

I can't review this as I never received it.  It arrived at FedEx down the road from my house and then disappeared.  Highly likely stolen by a FedEx employee.  They don't seem to care.  Happy Holidays....

I love vr and I think the face incert is not that great when you buy a separate one it gets way better and since a lot of the games don't require an internet connection you can literally take it anywhere

PERFECT purchase to combat quarantine and rainy days. My whole family loves this! So many different things to do, I love the workout apps and my kids love the simulations. I'm glad we pulled the trigger!

Great product- the visual is awesome, does not crash when playing games and talking to others is good -- the downfall is dies too quick, too heavy hurts my neck and the straps should be positioned better

This is not your typical vr headset. This thing is mind blowing adding a new twist from movie watching to complete immersive action.  The hardest part is trying to understand now this can only cost $400.

Really like this. Good graphics,  easy to set up and play. Loads of great apps, alot of games to download and lots of social and world exploring apps too. There are apps for getting your creativity goin.

Oculus quest 2 headset is a great device. Many options to choose from on the App Store. Battery life is the only issue that I have with the device but there are alternatives to get you more battery life.

Fun for the whole family!!!  Love playing some mini golf or poker or breaking a sweat in a workout. Something for everyone. If you can get past the seasickness feeling you sometimes get it is amazing!!!

I had purchased this for my son. He loves it. First few days it gave very bad rash in and around his nose and eyes. I was ready to return it but after few more days of use the rash started to disappear.

After 1 month we realized that we were getting dizziness after playing. I called to Best Buy to return it but it was not possible. I am sad because we are not playing and I can’t return. A lot of money!

It’s better in the video or smoothness quality than the previous one. Also the smell is not as strong as the previous one. The previous will make you dizzy and this one actually not much. Great product.

This was my first foray into 4K. I have the PSVR (got it at the same time) and like that system too, but for ease of use and quality of controllers, you can’t beat the Quest 2. I’ve had a blast already!

This is absolutely incredible! The experience of VR at home has truly gone to the next level. I love that you do not need a PC for this version, that was the only thing holding us back on the first one.

Not as high quality as I was hoping.  Certainly much more advanced than PSVR.  Was hoping for a good planetarium app but all available was a let down.  Most use this for 3D videos and research projects.

Like it so far. Pretty good games. Not as much selection if you don’t want shooter games. Not giving 5 stars because battery life should be better. Only get up to 2 hours before battery completely dies.

Christmas present. According to the box it doesn't require anything but wifi. I think the kids are going to keep busy for a while. I got the extended  warranty in case they walk into walls or something.

This is an AWESOME VR set! You can get lost in it and the dynamics of it. Forget where you are for a while. It's gonna be a long winter ending 2020 and this will help pass the time ! Excellent graphics!

It can be heavy on the face at times but it’s still a great experience. It’s only going to get better. Graphics of it has a bit of a haze. But like I said it’s still great and only going to get better..

You’ll want to get the 256 GB if you are planning on having a few games on the Oculus. Realistic virtual reality and great family fun. You can stream and watch what others are doing to be more involved.

I am not a huge gamer, but I must say the Oculus Quest 2 VR rig is the most immersive gaming experience I have ever had. Pistol Whip is the best first-person shooter I have ever played, and I have not played that many. Eleven table tennis feels just like playing real ping pong. The free app to explore the International Space Station can induce vertigo and motion sickness. The Thrill of the Fight is a brilliant boxing game and a real cardio workout. You can connect the Oculus to your gaming PC with a cable (purchased separately), but I have only used it as a standalone system. You download the games directly to the Oculus using wi-fi. The setup could not be simpler. No wires. Just you, the Oculus headset and two hand controllers. All for less than the cost of the Xbox or PS5. I am honestly blown away by this system. It is accessible, intuitive, so there is not a steep learning curve, and fun. Heck you can even watch Netflix in a much nicer VR house that any of us could afford. If you are bored, have a few hundred bucks burning a hole in your wallet, this could be the therapy for you.

Even if you aren't into gaming you need one I'd these.  The technology is amazing the videos are just as amazing as the games.  The environment is so immersive it's like a getaway without leaving home.

The virtual effects are AMAZING ... I've recently purchased this for my 15yrs old daughter. She is playing Star Wars and Fruit Ninja and the fruits look like ther going hit you there so close amazing..

My favorite part of 2020.  I love playing it when I can get it away from my 7yr old.  And so far most of the games are fairly priced. 2 friends have already purchased them after playing mine just once.

Truly one of the best purchases we’ve made in a long time. Fantastic interactive VR. Easy to set up and use. Plenty of games available. Better then any gaming console out there (gets us off the couch).

Amazing VR device!  Love it! Good price, good packaging, quick delivery! Lots of fun to use, great games!  Best purchase in a long time! Wish it were under $350 price point, but def worth the purchase!

I just bought the Oculus 2.  I was about to open the box and saw this - WARNING: Cancer and Reproductive Harm - www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.  Does anyone know about this?  This is going to be returned ASAP.

Fantastic VR headset. I highly recommend it. Easy navigation. The games on it and the ones in development are exciting. Can't wait for more content and Christmas day so I can steal it from my kids. Lol

This thing is awesome. I've tried many VR headets where you use your phone and they were terrible. This blows them away. The only negative i can think of is battery life. Make sure you keep it charged.

This is my first vr headset and I got to say this thing is very fun to use. I bought twd saints and sinners and it was a blast! I definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking to buy a vr headset!

The big Xmas  gift this year and an absolute hit with kids.  Started off with 3 games, Beat Saber, The Climb 2, and Job Simulator.  Kids having a blast with all 3.  My personal favorite is Beat Saber.

I bought 2 of them and they worked so well. I gave 1 away for the exact same price to my friends. I REALLY recommend it. Also, add me on roblox! Link:    https://www.roblox.com/users/492806146/profile

Fun for the entire family.  My wife used to meditate my kids love the boxing and sci-fi games.  And I have a blast with the roller coasters.
And the adjustable straps makes a perfect fit for everyone.

So far im liking this but so many different games and ive found no where to actually find out how to play them.  I had to purchase the ratchet headband as the one it came with is not very comfortable.

Everything so far has been great with the Oculus. My kids from 7-14 have all played it and love it. The adults haven't had any free time to use it yet but I'm sure it's going to be loved by the family

This is one amazing VR system, the entire family is having fun with it. The graphics are amazing, you get the feeling of actually being inside the game. This is hands down the best VR headset to date!

Great gaming system I got it for my son because I didn’t think I would be able to get him the new Xbox but luck had it I got one right before Xmas now he barely uses this but my wife and I love it lol

Wireless VR definitely needs to be the way the platform advances because it's AWESOME. I have played with my friends Rift plugged into his gaming PC and it was cool but no cord makes a huge difference

This is my first time using a VR system like oculus, I ve used some others before but none compare to the oculus Quest 2, no doubt one of the greatest systems of VR now days. 100% would recommend it!!

The console itself is amazing but i needed to buy an $80 link cable and a $30 card for the usb drive. The headband is incredibly uncomfortable but there are other ones you can buy online to replace it

Best money ever spent. Just watching my son setting it up was great. He played a game or two and his wife joined in also.
Now I did get this for my grandchildren. So I hope they get to play with also.
Got this for our grandchildren ages 11 and 14.  They both love it, as well as their parents.  There are games they can also play with their friends who have the system.  Very happy with the purchase.

Overall I'd say that the occulus quest 2 is by far the best VR headset out there. The graphics are amazing its so easy to use its portable so it makes it easy to take anywhere and share with friends.
I was really impressed by the Oculus 2.  The headset is comfortable, setup is easy, and there’s a good selection of games.  The VR really works well with good graphics, and very responsive movement.
These are a blast. Don’t use them every day but when we do use them it’s always a good time! Every time we have a family get together these come out and all ages can get in on them and have a blast.

Surprisingly affordable, easy to use, connecting to a computer can be a hassle especially if you don’t want to buy the $80 cable for it (there are cheeper knock off brands that work almost the same)

Family loves it. Being a stand alone unit it allows us to play it anywhere in the house. Recommend purchasing the comfort strap if you can. Makes a world of difference for people with larger heads.
The whole family loves this. I have never experienced anything like this. I’m not a gamer, I’m grandma that bought the Christmas present and I love the relaxation of the Dessert Terrace and more…..

Absolutely love this.  Great for stand alone gaming as well as for PC VR and wireless to the PC.  Fantastic value for it's price, best bang for the buck for VR gaming for Stand alone and for PC VR.
This thing is the COOLEST, The Walking Dead Saints and Sinners is a MUST!!! I cast to my tv so we can all watch the mayhem, I use it to surf the net too cause it does have a browser. Glad I got it!
The only problem that I have with my oculus is that bluetooth audio is a little bit out of sync, but my audio system has an option to adjust the timing. Other than that I really enjoyed my oculus.
Buy this! It’s SO fun! My 28 yo son told me about it. I even love watching other people play. My husband and I “fight” each other & we’re 50. :) I also use it to exercise & watch shows. I love it!
We got this as a gift for our kid, which he loves.  Previously we had the setup that used your cell phone, which was pretty neat, albeit a little gimmicky - this is on an entirely different level.
The supernatural app is a true workout!! Guides you on how to properly ensure you adequate spacing before playing. Games are pretty good. I suggest getting the larger gigs because you'll need them
Great vr headset. I like the option to get lense's for the headset because I wear glasses. The fact that you can adjust the lense's to be wider or narrower to fit your face is also a great option.
The upgrade from my Gear VR is amazing! There were a couple downfalls like the games on my account cannot be used no more and have to be re-purchased but besides that the product itself is amazing
Absolutely love it! I'm still learning everything you can do with it,  and it is so much fun!  The whole house plays with it. Both my brother and I have one now and we play games together on them.
I have so much fun with this oculus virtual reality. It is unbelievable how realistic this is. I play beat saber every day and also do fitness programs. I can’t say enough good things about this.
Looks amazing and comfortable. Cant wait to try it but unfortunately its a Christmas gift for a kid so I can't comment much more than that. But super excited to take it from him on Christmas day!
Purchased 2 of this item - both for grandsons Christmas presents.  Both grandsons, from different parents, can't put it down.  Comments such as the best Christmas present ever from both families.
This system is amazing. The graphics are beautiful. My huseband was so excited to receive this as a gift. The games are fun too. Battery life is about 2-3 hrs. But that seems to be perfect for us
I am upgrading from the original Oculus Quest and it was well worth it to me. The quality of the screen is a lot better and the device as a whole just fits better now. Very happy with it overall.
Probably one of the best purchases I have ever made. It is true that it’s stand alone but if you have a decent gaming PC or Laptop, you will open up an entire new world of gaming and experiences.
I would not recommend this as you are forced to have a Facebook account.    Focus is an issue they should have made each lens adjustable for focus on each eye.  Disappointing for the money spent.
Great product. Only have about 10 hours on it but this vr is amazing and quest 2 headset fits great and adjusts well. The hand controls feel great and the whole system makes games very realistic.
This is seriously the best! Great workout, fun games, and it’s great for young kids. My 4 year old is like a pro at it…there is also some games that let you only use your hands…definitely a 10/10
Fantastic VR experience! The content is amazing and the graphics far exceeded my expectations. I had a virtual reality headset before and it quickly had me bored. The Oculus system is incredible!
I love my headset.  I am away from home right now and I brought the quest 2 and I  am loving it . Don't like that when I am not home I can't play my rift games . But I do love my oculus products.
This has been a great experience from a long time gamer, Getting used to the VR environment is the biggest draw back. I can only play maybe half an hour at a time before having to give it a rest.
I tried this out and thought it was just ok.  The games are kinda expensive for what it is.  I thought the graphics would be better.  My son likes it and the product was for him so that's a plus.
Oculus is perfect for VR gaming. My kids lives it and picture display are so richly amazing!!! Pure HD to the highest maximum clarity. Love it. Highly recommended if you like VR gaming! The BEST!

This thing is amazing! VR quality is incredible, the immersive experience is better than PSVR. 
Wireless makes it so much easier to get around, and movable boundaries make it safer for all ages!
It’s pretty cool, bought it on a whim so wasn’t sure what to expect. I like to use the exploring abs but there’s not much of a library. The resolution isn’t super sharp unless I’m doing it wrong
Love it worth the money for sure extremely immersive. I have onward , creed, walking dead quite a few games . VR has come a long way ! We wanted a ps5 but not likely anymore this is way cooler .
So fun! Amazing! Technology never ceases to amaze me. You can be visiting Prague at Christmas! Go scuba diving! And SO much freaking more! All virtually! Games! Exercise! Traveling! Movies! Wow!
Great first VR device for anyone. Cheapest high quality VR headset in the game. Head strap only real let down as after about 1/2 hour becomes uncomfortable. They do have more head straps though.
I didn't know what to expect when I purchased this.  The videos online simply cannot describe how amazing the VR world is!! It was so good I picked another one up for my daughter and son-in-law.
I love this! My boyfriend has glasses and the oculus quest is better for him with how it accounts for his glasses and doesn’t squish them into his face. So maybe not 5 stars if you have glasses.
I have to give this a 4, only because the setup was horrible, no instructions except when you are online and do this and do that.  Would have been nice to get a heads up.  Other than that great!
Looking for something for exercise. As close to the Kinect since it has been outdated and eliminated. Best thing ever it was. Really the oculus doesn’t compare and limited on games for the cost.
Purchased as a gift for my wife’s birthday and she loves it. Can really get a workout with some of the games. Bought a better headband as the original is not that great. Will be a customer again
I would say fun for the family but facebook dose not want any one under 13 to play it also dont get put in facebook jail or it will not work other than that is built great and works like a charm
Great overall product. I'm pretty satisfied with the performance and gameplay so far. I've been having a lot of fun with it. I don't like the idea that you have to tie it to a facebook account.
It's awesome. I was amazed at how immersive that this thing is, and the amount of content is surprising considering how "new" the technology is. I probably won't get a PS5 now that I have this.
Very excellent product, I love the packaging! Feels premium and organized. I don’t have any complaints about it yet, very simple set up and helpful. I love it and would definitely recommend it!
Very easy to use and set up anywhere. Although I wish I purchased a bundle, getting the right accessories has proven to be a task. There were so many accessories but most don’t fit a quest two.
Super fun and definitely worth the price if youll play it!!! My whole family loves it!! Getting lots of games and having that family time is what its about! Im enjoying every bit of it!!! 10/10
VR has come a long way since the first VR phone/headsets. Pretty good library of games and entertainment options with the Oculus, I'm sure I just scratched the surface. Great experience so far!
I bought this because they said it was sharper and more balanced than the first Quest and it is.  All of my games transferred to the Quest 2 with no problems.  Its lighter and more comfortable.
This product is amazing, cannot wait for the new updates and multiplayer capability. If you have access to gymnasium lots of fun, it you only have a space to stand in place its also alot of fun
Lightweight, compact, and durable. I've been having a blast with my Oculus 2. It's a very nice setup with a seemless platform that is easy to learn. I find myself getting a real workout with it

Lots of fun and educational! My teenage boys like the games. Hubby & I enjoy exploring immersive videos and locations. You can hook it up to a Windows pc with a cable to access apps & games available for the oculus rift but the cable is $75 in store and a bit confusing to choose the correct cable type on Amazon. $75 is too much in my opinion for the cable and we’ve been pleased with what we can use on the Quest 2 store. We’ve also heard you can use an app called Virtual Desktop to access the Steam library but we haven’t tried it yet. For first timers, stick with apps rated “Comfortable” when starting out, otherwise you’ll get queasy. The headset can get heavy, but by the time you notice that, it’s time to take a break anyways. It does get dirty, showing a dinginess on the white straps and if your kid’s sweaty friends use it, you’ll wanna wipe it down and figure out how to clean the face shield. I’m hoping for an improved face shield cuz that was gross. A gentle wipe down took care of that for now. Overall, it was a great family activity for the family over the holidays and we like it a lot.
Nothin like a hard wk at work through a pandemic to come home crack an ice cold beverage and put your oculus virtual gaming apparatus on and enter a new reality. Awesome product and technology.
I love it the best family fun entertainment we had it a long while. Great for teenagers it keeps them active. Older people tell me they feel like there on vacation when they look at the scenery
Absolutely love my Oculus quest! I purchased the original quest and have noticed major improvements to the quest 2. I highly recommend beat saber and drop dead to those who purchase a quest 2.
With plenty of titles and different games for every personality, these headsets offer hours of fun in a virtual world. Playing online with friends brings everyone together even when far apart.
Get it while you can. With everything happening. It's good to escape the world's problems that can't be helped with this product. If you haven't tried VR I do highly recommend giving it a try.
Amazing headset, with only a few minor flaws, but a great buy for the price that is given! You may need to buy either a battery pack, as the battery life feels short, but it isn't a necessity.
Good battery life. Last ms about 2 hours. Like that because it’s a built in break for kids to do something else like go outside.streaming quality is good. Feels like your in a different world.
Love this product but it is defected. It’s blurry on the edges. No smudge marks. Planning and returning it for one a new one. Hopefully the new one will be fine. Other than that isn’t awesome.
Really awesome VR wish I had a house like that. Ha ha cool games wish there were more. I think it's great that they put a warning on the game that you should only play no more than 30 minutes.
This is an absolutely amazing experience!  Experiencing VR in a safe environement and when you walk out of the 'safe zone' the cameras take over so you can walk safely.  Well designed and FUN!
Bought for kids for christmas.  Got to play with it a little myself.  Pretty wild to use.  Visuals are amazing. Lots of options and games the kids have been playing.  Can't wait to get my own!
Kids and I are having a ton of fun with this.  Some great games for free that have the most playability... some of the more expensive games are boring after they have been played a short time.
Make sure to get the insurance.  It's an awesome system but still made by man so our first one got glitchy after a week so we were able to swap out for a new one and have been good ever since.
What an amazing device. I am so excited to start downloading programs. Set up was simple and the adjustable goggles allowed for a comfortable fit. Can’t wait to engage with other oculus users.
Much improved display quality over previous generations of VR headsets.  Love that it is stand alone so no computer needed.  Many fun games.  Only downside is battery life is only a few hours.
We have not gotten past the some of the trials and tutorials yet but graphics are great.  Family enjoys the boxing game.  Unfortunately a few were so realistic my daughter got motion sickness!
Very fun. Easy to use. Get the additional head strap with extended battery. I like how u can try games and return them within 14 days if not happy. Hey VR FIT. good work out. Replaces the gym.
Great system with some awesome games. The game ecosystem isn’t huge but they have some really unique titles. The game mechanics have been pretty similar between games as well. Would recommend.
Love the Oculus. Had the first Quest which was great. This one, although lighter, doesn't fit as well and the straps don't tighten up as well but the processor is much quicker which is great.
I bought the oculus because i bought one for my daughter a few weeks ago and she wanted someone to play games with her. All i can say is wow. you really get a work out on some of these games.

Great gaming device. 
The whole family has been using it. 
The hand controls take a little getting used to. 
Games aren’t too expensive to purchase. 
You need a Facebook account to get games.
Great product.  Very fun. Wireless is definitely the way to go. Haven’t had a problem with storage yet. The free games are not very good. Be prepared to spend $20-$30 a piece on decent games.
better than i expected! probably one of the coolest electronic devices on the market. i suggest buying one of these if your interested in something very different compared to everything else.
It's great and fun for the whole family. The kids love it too. It's  a workout for sure, especially the boxing. The roller coaster got me dizzy but I was scared and kept closing my eyes. Lol.
Is everything you would think VR should be. 10x better than Oculus go. Has decent battery life but still doesn’t last long. So I recommend getting a longer charging cord to use while playing.
Great VR headset. All in one, but can also use a computer. 1440p graphics look great and the 90hz refresh rate are super easy on your eyes. The accessories also make the stock headset better.
Our son just absolutely loves tihis.  It was for his 8th grade gradduatiion gift.  He does find himself bumping into walls, ot reakizing where he is in a room.  He has hours of fun with this.
This is a great purchase.  We all enjoy hands nights in VR. Can access any vr game you want to play. If it isn't available for the headset, you just use virtual desktop to play like the Rift.
Got this for the kids Xmas present. They really liked because they enjoyed interacting with the objects and play around. Plus they get to stand and move more instead of sitting down all day.
Great system. I highly suggest buying the extended life battery pack. The battery doesn't last long. Also recommend getting an extra lpng charging cord if you dont purchase the battery pack.
A fantastic VR headset. The games are so much fun and the multiplayer experience is great. Being able to play Table Tennis with my granddaughter who lives over 1,000 miles away was exciting.
Got the oculus for my fiancé for his birthday and he loves it. I loved it also it looks like you are in the game and it also looks clear, I need to get one for myself I fell in love with it.
Very easy to set up. A lot of games & experiences available. Headset is a little heavy for the kids but that helps to limit how long they play. Overall, very happy with our first VR headset.
This is the coolest thing. It was a gift for my son. Of course he loves it. And i love how he can play his game and still be up and kind of active. Im quite impressed withe graohics as well.
This works great. You really feel like you are at the beach or by the fireplace. The games are awesome! You feel like the bullets are real and coming at you! We are going to buy another one!
I love how realistic all the games are, it brings you into a world like no other. My kids love playing it almost every night! If i could, I'd reccomend this for all of my daughter's friends!
My family really loves the vr unit.  Lots of family friendly games.  Great for exercising. Only downside is the battery life.  Ended up returning for the one with the larger capacity memory.
This is an awesome gaming system, it’s like a computer or game console. My daughter loves it, keeps her active. I just wish it came with better selection of free games for the price you pay.
Unbelievable experience, entering a whole new dimension every time its used. Only drawback is you have to be on facebook for this to work. Games are easy to download and can cost $25 and up.
Best game we ever purchased.  So glad the PS5 was out of stock.  Initially purchased this item as a backup gift, and now we have 3 because its the best gaming system are family has ever had.
I bought this to have a system for working out since I can’t go to the gym due to covid.  Very happy with it.  I definitely advise on getting the elite headset.  It makes a huge difference.
I bought this device for my granddaughter for her upcoming birthday.  She had been dreaming of  owning her own Occulus.  She is absolutely delighted; and Grandma is happy to see her happy!!
My husband and son really enjoy the Oculus. The system itself is incredible. We don't like that it requires Facebook logins, and it's difficult for them to find each other within the games.
This was a gift and it is played everyday. My son loves it for games and just watching a show on TV. My son is in his fifties so not just for younger ages. Anyone can escape in the reality.
Short version - if you want a standing, room scale headset for that AND PC VR this is the headset you want. If you play seated VR and don't care about room scale you want the HP Reverb Pro.
Awesome gaming! It’s a totally immersive experience but if you get dizzy easily then this is probably not the best thing for you. Get the travel case for this also. You’re going to need it.
Great Gift, my husband loves it! I only wished that there was two headsets for that $500+ I spent. But, that has nothing to do the function of the device. I would definitely purchase again.
My favorite thing to do!! I make sure I get on at least once a day. Beat saber is my fav, sometimes it doesn’t pick up your moves and you loose points but other than that, pretty good game.
It's a good headset if you're looking to play a few games but my problems are in the headstrap and lenses. They're okay but not the greatest, but that's the tradeoff for this kind of value.
My face or should I say eye space is too big for the product even with the lens in max spacing making the images burry at all times. That apart I love the concept and contents in the device
Purchased for our 11 year old grandchild.  We may never see him again!  Maybe when he's back to school and has to leave it behind.  He loves it and we are now the COOLEST GRANDPARENTS EVER!
This thing is fun as heck.  I did have to buy the link cable on line to access Quill and Medium but that was AOK.  Having no cables while working up a bit of a sweat in Beat Saber is great.

It was really fun, but I returned it because I wanted to get a gaming set-up. But I recommend it. 10/10
(Also try out Five Nights At Freddy’s Help Wanted, it’s a great and scary experience)
This stand alone VR is awesome.  I sold my PS4 pro and PSVR for this. The Quest 2 can also be connected to my PC via both Virtual Desktop and the Link cable.  I am happy with this purchase.
I love this thing. Battery is a little on the short side when you play non stop and cast to your tv. Still very worth it. Recommend purchasing the elite strap with battery as a work around.

Incredibly amazing! Only thing I don’t like is that the battery does not last long AT ALL. It drains in about two hours of playtime which goes by fast because
You’re having so much fun lol
We bought this to play games with our granddaughter. She’s almost a teen and we want all the time we can with her before she no longer wants to hang with us. So realistic games it’s scary.
I bought this for my children. They love it and convinced my wife and I to try it. We started looking at virtual reality videos of vacation spots. The 360 degree videos are pretty amazing.
Wow! We got this for my daughter to ease the stress of being homebound and limited social outings. It Oculus has kept my daughter both busy and immersed in a wonderful virtual distraction.
Cool gaming system. Would be Noce if it game with more Free Games like the Xbox and PlayStation. And some of the games should come with more options. Overall it’s Fun and a decent workout.
Great product so realistic. Bought it to work out and it’s so entertaining you don’t feel like you are working out. Didn’t have any problems downloading games. Would recommend for any age.
Very comfortable, and very next gen.  Got this for our 7 year old.  He gets a good workout daily.  The only problem is when we use the wire to connect to our Pc... gets disconnected often.
Love it! Quar-heaven! Was playing & exploring in less than 5 minutes and I’m a boomer. Exercise, eye-hand coord, big screen movies, inexpensive awesome games and very, very fun! Recommend!
The graphics were nice, but 3 of us in the family got motion sickness within 10 minutes of gameplay.  Bumer...it seemed really cool, but not worth the risk that you could not play with it.
Bought it on a whim, so glad I did. Bought it for my teen’s birthday. However I probably use it more than he does. Gonna have to buy my own. Seriously a great time and set up was seamless.
This product is revolutionary. Coming from the PS VR,  everything is an amazing upgrade. The visuals are crisp, the tracking is phenomenal, and its been overall just an amazing experience.
Excellent. Easily the best and easiest to use VR on the market today. We got one and now have purchased 3 just for our family and 2 more as gifts. The ultimate pandemic lockdown life saver
My first VR and I’m pretty impressed. Graphics and gameplay are great. Very easy to use. Wish the battery lasted longer. You get about 2 hours of use per charge. Overall a really great VR.
Extremely fun to play with. You will definitely lose track of time when you're wearing this. I have to say that the Star Wars games are what got me hooked and keep my playing quite a while

I didn't know what to expect, but once you put it on the fun is outstanding 
Clear graphics and tons of options. Be sure to get the extended battery headset .... you won't be disappointed
Best purchase I made! I am using this to help with my balance and such so this is going to eventually be cheaper that physical therapy and the whole family can download games and play it.

Price is worth what I paid considering the usage and technology. 
Quality is very good. Light weight. Durable.
A lot of content. Something for everyone in my house
Easy to set up and use.

My only complaint is the limited range of content Facebook allows without the daunting task of setting up side loading when you’re new to vr
Otherwise this is a magical introduction to vr
It is awesome! I used to have the original Rift. I do miss this pc connections for that but i can play this anywhere. I love to watch movies in my bed feeling like I am in a real theater.
Best budget standalone VR headset you can buy. Couple it the Oculus Link cable (or an alternative) and Virtual Desktop and you are able to do PC VR games (as long as your PC is VR Ready).
Absolutely amazing. It’s realistic and the graphics are amazing. Definitely recommend. You can play anything from first person shooter, to fitness games. Great for when it’s cold outside.

Fun for the whole family.  Games and virtual tours of plays previously only dreamed about visiting.  

Was apprehensive at first, but the experience is quite exhilarating and adventurous.
Love the oculus only downside is your forced to make a Facebook or use your current one. Would give it five stars if Facebook was just an option a d you had a choice to use something else

We have never had a VR set before so this is great for us. I love that you do not need any additional console to play.
I would of given it 5 stars if the headset held a charge for longer.
Excellent quality. Lacking good supply of puzzle games. For price of purchase one would expect that you’d get a good selection of free games but they cost $20 or more and are quite short.
WOW.  Simply... Cool!  I'm not a avid gamer and around 50 yrs old, so I had to jump into VR.  I've only used it a few times due to time constraints, but I trying to get time to play more.

The resolution is not any better. I liked the old headstrap better. Also, the charge cable is too short.

A metal laptop like casings would make this thing a work of art. Controllers too.
This is so much fun! So glad I went ahead and purchased. Could definitely use some better instructions for adding games and playing via your pc. Also battery life could be better for sure
Really enjoyable gaming system.  I put it on and was completely mesmerized by the whole experience.  Downloaded all of the free stuff and bought a few games.  You will not be disappointed
It took me some time to get use to the headset. I had to buy a different, better built, head strap to hold it in place. After i recieved the head strap i used it until the batteries died.
Very quick shipping! Arrived a day earlier than it said! Packaged very well and securely! Purchased for my boyfriends birthday, and after trying it, had to order another one for myself!!!
Amazing.  Love my Quest 2.  This technology has improved so much over the years.  Q2 was easy to set up.  PC Link works well to connect to my gaming machine.  Standalone mode works great.
The headset itself is good for the price. Not a 2k display like the HP reverb but its ok. One problem is the need for FB account and FB tracking every thing you do kind of spoils the fun.
Having so much fun with this VR headset. TIP ask a friend for a referal code before activating as there are offers ranging from $25 to $100 game store credits depending on the promotions
Its pretty cool headset I like no wires. I haven't tried the headset with a pc yet,but maybe in the future. I like how interactive the headset is...mind you my last oculus was a gear vr.
Love it good graphics dosent lag. But the battery life is only about 2 hours so make sure to either buy a battery charger that u can strap on to the head peice or a longer charging cord.
Bought this for my wifes girlfriend and now I am so jealous. I was never really interested in these until she actually showed me what they can do and the games and all. Now I want one...
I am very happy with my oculus I have been to more places than I could have imagined have not played games yet but I’m sure it will be a lot of fun but I’m going to travel more thank you

awesome graphics with a lot of storage for the games that we use.
OnTrac lost our original order and they still haven't found it, but other than that it's a very nice compared to rift s.
I love my Quest. The quality is unbelievable, and the option to either use it standalone, or link up with a computer makes it the obvious choice for VR consumers both casual and serious.
pretty fun to play with, I mean it’s VR. The only thing is to play games on it you need to buy them and they cost around 14.99-29.99. I mean it was $400 Can I get like one game for free?
This is a great product...I loved them but the person I bought them for got motion sickness when wearing them.  This should tell you how realistic things are when you put the goggles on.
I love this product! I had the original oculus & decided to upgrade. This model is amazing, definitely worth the upgrade. The graphics, comfort, weight of the headset are so much better.
The head strap is uncomfortable and you have adjust it every time you share it. I bought the elite head strap and that is easy to adjust and comfortable too. It should just come with it.
My son just got this last night and he loves it. So easy to set up and he can play on line with friends as well. Will be very entertaining being home this winter with Covid restrictions!

My first VR headset and definitely not disappointed!

I love the guardian boundary playzone that you can set up for your own safety.

Guaranteed hours upon hours of time spent in VR land
The family really enjoys the Oculus. Easy(ish) for our 6 year old to use. Casting it up to our TV is a great help for navigation purposes for younger kids.  It is also very entertaining.
bought this for grandson for christmas. He loves it and his mom said she would go to wake him up for school and he has covers over his head with the Oculus on and his arm has the remote.
The science for VR has certainly come a long way.  Very playable.  I can wait to see it 10 or even 5 years from now.   It will be hard to tell the difference between real and generated!
Husband is happy. Great gameplay and visual quality is much better than other VR products I've experienced. I like that it's stand alone and wireless, we can play anywhere in the house.
Hands down one of the best Virtual Reality headsets there is. I’ve heard that having to have a Facebook account is annoying to some but it isn’t that big of a deal to me. Great quality.
All good but the only bad thing was the person who delivered the package who threw the package did not leave it at the door lousy bad service they should be more careful with the things
With it being a total VR. Package that can be used out of the box. The graphics are not  the greatest. Way more limited free games than you think. Games can range from 4.99 up to 59.99.

As a Oculus Rift S owner this was an easy purchase and transition.
No longer tethered to a computer, free to wonder the world on foot.

Great games, fun to play, easy to use.
Great buy!
Compared to the oculus rift s, better system, better value. I bought the 256gb but will primarily use oculus on my PC so the 64 would have been fine. Very happy with the quest 2 so far.
Best purchase I’ve made in a long time.  The headset strap that comes with it is super uncomfortable…I paid a little more and got the elite strap with extended batter - HUGE difference!
The Oculus Quest 2 is a great game system to have around when your couped up in your house. It's a great way to get exercise and work on hand-eye coordination. Definitely worth getting.
This is my first experience with any type of VR. I am very impressed with this device and it is a great value for what you get. The thing I hate most is that it's connected to Facebook.
Powerful! Worth the money! I bought this for my son for Christmas and he loves it.  He had the first edition and he said this one was more comfortable. “Way cooler” was his exact words.
More fun than I could ever have imagined. Games are reasonably priced and the graphics are amazing, I’m so glad we purchased it. Good exercise and so much fun we purchased a second one.
Love this. I'm not a big gamer and this is easy to use. I bought it for myself and now my husband is always using it. The effects of vr are amazing and it is completely self contained.
Very happy with this purchase!  I thought I'd be the most interested, but haven't been able to play as much as I thought because my 15 and 6 year old daughters can't get enough either.
Love this. I'm not a big gamer and this is easy to use. I bought it for myself and now my husband is always using it. The effects of vr are amazing and it is completely self contained.
I love the design and I think functionally it does the job. However just like what most says the fitting sucks and I need to get separate straps and fit pack...thinking of returning it
This system is tons of fun. My kiddos love it! You really get immersed into the graphics and sound. I’ve learned to connect it to the internet so they can play with other Oculus users.

Awesome tech in a small affordable package.

If you want to try VR, this is the way to do it. The apps and games are limited with its young age buy I anticipate a boom in new software.
Exchange for Oculus 1, which the battery had stopped charging. So far, so good on Oculus 2. t this for my son for his birthday. He likes it just fine. Get the extended warranty though.
I love VR. from htc vive, valve index, quest 1, 2. Id seriously buy the quest 2 over a ps5 or any next gen console. VR is a special tech that makes playing on a flat screen old school!

My son has an Occulus quest and wanted the 2 for a game only available on the Quest 2 platform 
He absolutely loves it! FYI with the quest 2 you have to have a Facebook account to play
Pretty awesome. I wasn’t sure about picking this up but with COVID and stuck in the house last year, it was a lot of fun to throw on and play some games and actually get some exercise.
This is well packed and a major upgrade over the original Quest. The price point makes it a justifiable purchase for the ones already in VR, also, for the ones planning to get into VR.
Having bought a 'slip your phone in this case' VR headset last year and finding that quite disappointing, I was amazed at the advancement in technology with the Q2.  Worth every penny!
I knew exactly what I wanted, and although none of my item was in stock, it was ordered from another store and I was able to pick it up in just a few days.  Excellent customer service!
This was so much fun and so awesome! I definitely recommend it for everyone. I couldn’t keep mine personally because it caused terrible motion sickness but it was still fun regardless!

Fun!  We bought an extra piece, nose piece to block out light from below.

I feel that while it's a good product, it was a bit too pricey.  It's a good idea, however, the headset is heavy.  It's too bad that it can't be lighter, causing less neck discomfort.
Love it,  very easy to setup as long as you have a Facebook account!  So I wouldn’t buy it until you have one or are planning on getting a Facebook account.  Other than that. Love it.
I highly recommend a Oculus to it is relaxing it can be exciting it’s very fun! Text you way to different worlds. I have already recommended to three friends and they bought one each.
Best purchase ever! It is an excellent product. Quality is so high. Being wireless makes it super convenient to use . It is addictive. It is worth every dollar. I highly recommend it.
this thing is rediculous the wife loves it my 6 year old is funnier the all get out falls all the time but lease you have to stand and move around. so its not like a normal video game
Fantastic all in one vr option. As a previous Rift owner I can attest that the image quality far surpasses the original Oculus Rift. The option of being untethered in vr is priceless.
Fantastic all in one vr option. As a previous Rift owner I can attest that the image quality far surpasses the original Oculus Rift. The option of being untethered in vr is priceless.
Love this VR system. Absolutely excellent for the price. My only complaint is that this product requires you to log into Facebook, the most intrusive of the big names in the internet.
Awesome experience for the whole family. The game play is top notch and very immersive. I personally love the Star Wars games and the kids seem to love it all. We couldn’t be happier!
Lots of fun to use. Still learning. Some issues with connecting to servers still but that should be worked out as Oculus catches up with the high demand. I would definitely recommend.
Very fun to use, my nephew was on it for hours ends and quite cheap compared to other VR. I am also waiting for the newest edition to come out and cant wait to compare this with that.

This is my first foray into the World of VR, and really only wanted to see what a home unit would be like after playing on one at a popular Family Attraction nearby.  I really like it, and it is truly immersive.  My only complaint (and why the lack of 5 stars) being that there is very little content.  I was really hoping that it had been enough years for more games to be playable on it...and instead I felt like I bought a Windows Phone.  It is BEAUTIFUL, and it works GREAT...but you can't do much other than stare at it.  Some people complain about having to use your Facebook account on it, but you can select to keep your information private and not announce that you own it, so what is the concern that is different than having any other Console login?  The inclusion of Documentaries and such is interesting, but if I wanted that, I would fire up my 3D glasses for my TV and get as immersive as I want and be able to have my Family next to me able to enjoy it.  It just seems silly to me to have a platform like this, and then have a severely limited supply of content that isn't a game or social networking.
100% love this!  Great product, some complain over graphics but its a complete V.R. system games are $5-35 still cheaper than other systems! Pretty durable, just upgrade the headset.
Having the ability to tether it to the PC for added processing power is fantastic. Coming from a PSVR this is an improvement in all areas other than having to re-purchase some games.
My boys are having so much fun playing with their new VR units.   I tried it as well and they are easy to navigate.  My only issue is that I get motion sick while playing some games.
Fun tool for exploring new and interesting ideas for health and fun. The original head strap should be replaced with the "elite strap" - ridiculous FB is nickle and diming customers.
Fantastic product and prompt delivery via mail. The only tricky part is adjusting the device just right at the perfect angle/position for that clear and blur free viewing experience.
Absolutely incredible! Especially for the price. Plus if you get the tether cord for it, you can connect it to your computer and get everything available for the Oculus Rift as well.
My 12 year old son loves it! He plays it everyday. The virtual reality aspect is really exciting for him and elevates the games to a different level. We highly recommend this device.
This is an amazing item. You can play games, watch movie’s, concerts etc. awesome virtual reality effects. My husband loves it. My 4 year old daughter can’t keep her hands off of it.
Just An amazing product! That’s really all you can say about the product! The shipping was fast! And lastly it was very easy to use your website and go through the checkout process!
This is  a great console! It really feels like I am there! I definitely recommend this for anyone that like Virtual Reality. This is even better than some of the rides at Universal!
I have had no issues with this. It is awesome and I’ve already had hours of fun. There’s tons of accessories for the controller and headset to make it even more comfortable as well.
This thing is fantastic you get plenty of exercise with this game console. I am 62 years old and I still enjoy playing games on this thing and watching my grandkids. Nothing but fun
I dont have any complaints. I have even turned a few family members as well as friends who have never done anything with VR and loved it and looking into getting one for themselves.
arrived in a timely fashion and in good condition. the replacement warranty was hassle free and very straight forward. A sincere thank you to best buy and there excellent employee's

This is a big hit at my house all the kids love it we have family that come out of town and use it my kids just love is absolutely great purchase and I would buy it again!
Great to play but you have to limit your time due to battery longevity and eye strain. The original head strap is terrible but you can find cheaper alternatives on Amazon.

Compared to the PlayStation VR it’s much better quality but nowhere near as comfortable. I’m slightly annoyed that I have to spend more money to make it bearable to wear.
I am not much of a gamer but I am thrilled with this VR device, the variety of games, and the exercise it provides as it engages you in the game.  No couch potatoes here!
I bought the Oculus for my workouts, I found conventional workouts/gyms boring and Oculus delivers! I work out every day now using a fitness ap, it’s like being a Jedi!!!
This is really fun. My child let me play on the roller coaster one. That's all the time he would share it with me for. The only downfall is the battery doesn't last long.
I Love it . It’s by far the best gaming system ever!!! It’s literally a whole new world your in. Best purchase ever. Everyone who plays mine goes out and buys their own .
Love the headset. Easy to set up and use. Great games. Well built. There is alot you can do with this headset. Surfing the web watching movies and netflix. Great product.
Games, Big Screen theater, travel the world and experience the culture. the controllers are easy to use but if I could add one thing it would be velcro wrist attachments.
Fantastic! Great graphics! I purchased for my nephew and I liked it so much I purchased one for myself and I am not a gamer at all. That’s how amazing this VR headset is.
This thing is amazing!  It would be even better if we have better internet speed. Be that as it may, the visuals are crisp, and gives one the feeling you are right there.
Not many interesting games but the VR experience is amazing. Very easy to get vertigo at first but it fades with exposure. Can’t wait for MMO games to come out on this!!!
Bought my daughter the oculus 2 for her birthday and she is on it all the time she loves it. For her birthday I also purchased the Polk audio sound bar it sounds awesome.
This is an awesome VR experience.  Great screen and build quality.  My family and I have had lots of fun using it.  Only downside, you must link it to a Facebook account.
As a first time VR customer, the experience is awesome and enjoyable for the entire family. This has been, so far, the best investment our family has made in a long time.

Oculus Quest 2 VR headset is mind blowing and amazing! Realistic hours of fun, excitement and pure family enjoyment. This device reminds our family of our Vegas trip and we were @ Caesars' Palace. We rode the Race To Atlantis.   Fun and safe for the entire family. Emerging yourself into the actual environments is way to real. Once you learn how work the controls you'll never tire of playing. You can also play against others in your contact list if you so choose to allow. Grand kids love it, There are some free games pre loaded, but you are able to try before you buy others, Games are bought through Oculus, not iTunes store. Game storage case is sold separately. Initially you have to have a Facebook Account and then download Oculus App. Oculus will not work without FB account. I recommend this for everyone. It's addictive and if you're home alone, please play SIT DOWN GAMES ONLY because you can injury oneself if playing standing games. There EXTREMELY REAL LIKE. Otherwise, tons of fun and educational things to partake in. Follow instructions recommendations on amount of time to spend using Oculus(hours a session).
The games are a little pricey but that's to be expected with vr I suppose. The actual device awesome. It's very convenient to have all your media and gaming all together.
It’s a really good crystal headset exept for the battery life. It would typically last 1-2 hours of gaming. It’s not that bad but still I think it should of been improved

I absolutely recommend this vr 
Its look great and the effects are other level 
The inly thing i didn’t like , it’s get a little bit dirty on the side other way its great
Santa brought this for our grown son. He's having a blast with it, playing with his cousins across the country. Mini golf and ping pong are favorites. Amazing technology.
This is so much fun!!!!  kids love it, wife and I love it, all guests that come to the house try it out.  I think we've probably created 10 or 12 sales so far in a month.

Great VR Setup! VR has come a long way since the day they started making it commercial in market. Not a massive game platform but has quite a bit for every type of gamer.
Excellent addition to the Oculus family of VR headsets. The new processor and increased resolution is just great! I would recommend this item to anyone interested in VR.

Upgraded from 2 Gear VR to Quest 2. What a difference, I didn't have to  deal with the overheating issue of the galaxy series  and  pain of  sticking the phone in and out of the headset. Don't get me wrong, the Quest 2 is not perfect but it is 100% improvement from any VR headset out there and that is including the original Quest 1 that i was trying to purchase but it  was out of stock. The IPD is a bit on the hard side to  get the best match to the viewing eyes. Sound is little weak but if u would like to deal with wires  around your neck or anywhere around  the side of your face, then  the sound can be improve. Battery is not the best by getting about 40 or so minutes of run time. But since it is not healthy to be staring through all the 3D effect, then it is a good excuse for the headset to  be taken off and put on charge when the battery is low before it completely shut down because of no power. The Elite strap is a no brainer, it must be added to the purchase for ease and comfortable use. This is a great product at the present time and  surely will improve over time. Let's enjoy what the geniuses out there are giving us.

The device itself is impressive.  But the support after the sale, is the worst I've ever experienced.  I owned the Quest 1, and bought lots of games.  When I received the Quest 2, it requires you to consolidate with your Facebook account.  I did so, having an active Facebook account for 10+ years.  However, after doing so their Oculus store would no longer accept any of my payment methods(I've got plenty of valid options).  It will not let me add any payment options, giving an error message that payment methods cannot be added at this time. I started a case with their customer service team 11 days ago, and nothing has been done.  I ask for an update regularly, and receive no response.  So I haven't been able to order a single game for my Quest 2.  Oculus is never going to resolve the issue, their customer service just offers a refund.  I don't want a refund, I want the issue resolved, as now I can't even buy games for my Quest 1 or Rift.  I've seen numerous people complaining about having the same exact issue in Oculus forums.  Oculus just advises them to open a ticket, but have not resolved the issue for anyone.  Worst customer service ever.

The Oculus Quest 2 is an amazing headset, whether it's for standalone use or tethered to a PC. The price is more affordable than ever and it's simply better than the Quest 1 in every way, except for one. The unit itself is lighter, more comfortable and faster than the Quest 1, but the screen has taken two steps forward and one step back. 

It's a higher resolution panel with greater pixel density, which allows for crisper images and helps reduce the screen door effect. It also supports higher refresh rates, providing a smoother experience. However, while the Quest 1 had OLED panels, capable of rich darks, the Quest 2 switched to standard LED panels which can't get nearly as dark. This leads to dark scenes in games and content being more of an ugly grey. While this isn't a big issue for most games with bright, colorful scenery, it completely kills immersion for dark games such as the Vader Immortal series and other Horror themed titles.

Overall, it's a much better product compared to the Quest 1, but it's *almost* a deal breaker that the screens are no longer OLED. Luckily, the improved resolution and faster refresh rate make it a worthwhile tradeoff.

This has become an essential product for me, I use it more than my game console sometimes, and often as much as my projector.

The browser works very well with online subscriptions, and having that extra space is worth it for your downloadable content.

It also has a lot of fun apps and games, and many entertaining video services too.

I have been using VR technology since 2015, and it has never been this convinient, you don't have to worry about being trapped, and you still get the best available resolution, plus having both controllers from the start allows you to take advantage of all the features from the start.

It is also completely responsive and functional, you never have to worry about that because the sensors work well. You can walk around with it and get closer, unlike Gear VR where you are stuck with the same perspective.

The only downside is that it doesn't work well when you use bluetooth, but they probably can solve that in the future.

I recommend having rechargeable batteries for the controllers, and the headset battery lasts 2 hours, so it is a good time, but an extra long cable us recommend to recharge if you need more time to enjoy it.

This headset is great for both the beginner to VR up to the veteran VR gamers. Whether you're looking for casual fun, active gaming, or fitness that's way more fun than running a treadmill, Oculus and the Oculus Store is an excellent choice. The technology is more advanced than I even realized. I play in multiple parts of my house and it remembers my outlined playing area each time. The 4 cameras that track your position do an outstanding job in various lighting conditions (do not use outside in sun) and make it easy to quickly access passthrough to view your surroundings without removing the headset. The touch controls and even hand tracking make your experiences so immersive.read the instructions on how to best adjust the lenses, including using the spacer if you wear glasses. There is no difference in the 64GB and 256GB other than storage capacity. 64GB gets youaybe 20 games, which you can always uninstall to free up space. I opted for 256GB to never worry about it and also have tto for recording my experiences. The Quest 2 is also great for getting into game development with Unity or Unreal.

I owned a Quest 1 until my ex stole it.... So I was happy when this one came out. There are some pros and cons here. 

It's definitely lighter on your face than the first one. It's also a LOT more painful. The straps that come with it are a complete joke. They have plastic pieces that will dig into back of your head. 

Another con is that they removed the piece on bottom that left you change eye width. Instead now, you have to physically reach in and move the eye pieces manually which is both stupid and causes fingerprints. I need it on to see if things are clear. You can't do that now. 

Another con is the wristbands on the controllers. The bands are cheap and thin, unlike the old quest. Sound is also not as good on this one.... Definitely will require ear buds if you are hard of hearing..

Screen door is gone now! This does improve on the screen door effect. Picture is clearer and it seems faster in general.

So while they beefed up what's inside, they went cheap and chintzy on comfort and function . You also now have to have a Facebook account or you can't play. 

What gives oculus???!? Why so many downgrades????? I like it but I'd almost rather have the first one.

The oculus was really buggy out of the box. It needed a software upgrade right away and crashed which caused all sorts of problems and was really frustrating. With tech support i managed to get that fixed but it took me several hours. Hours. Then the hand sets were non-responsive. i could not figure out how to get them to work. After a couple more hours fussing with them, i had to go back to tech support and learn how to factory reset the controllers. This was an insane amount of work to undertake for something brand new and never used. The instructions are insufficient. They assume everything goes flawlessly and have scant info in them. Useless. i was further annoyed to note that the unit was only manufactured two months prior. Seems to be _ poor quality control at The factory. After getting it fixed finally i was able to try it out. i have to say it's pretty cool once it works. Lastly, the head band is very poorly designed. It's annoying if you plan to allow multiple people to take turns using it, _ forget about it!! The strap is a pain to adjust for each user. It's really designed to set and forget. Super painful design. Bad choice. Otherwise The experience is good.
